4.name: Cat's Tail Secret Menu
4.description: Characters shielded by <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Paws</color> have their Movement SPD increased by 10% and their Stamina Consumption decreased by 10%.

5.name: Drunkards' Farce
5.description: Opponents who enter the AoE of <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color> have 10% decreased ATK for 15s.

6.name: Complimentary Bar Food
6.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

0.name: A Lingering Flavor
0.description: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color> end.

1.name: Shaken, Not Purred
1.description: Increases <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Paws</color>' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%.\nAdditionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Paws</color> shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

2.name: A—Another Round?
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Wine Industry Slayer
3.description: Within the radius of <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color>, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%

4.name: Double Shot, on the Rocks
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Paws</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
5.description: Characters within <color=#FFD780FF>Signature Mix</color>'s radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:\n·Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.\n·Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.

fetter.title: Treasure of Dream Garden
fetter.detail: An elusive merchant who has a fondness for glittering Mora.

costume.name: I Love Mora
costume.description: Dori's outfit. This outfit almost begs to be further adorned with gems and precious metals, loudly announcing its wearer's love of wealth to the world. And they say that this is the merchant Dori's casual wear... So does this mean that she has clothes even more expensive than this one!?

nameCard.name: Dori: Jinni
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nIf you wipe the lamp she gave you and then scrub the Mora you gave her, no wish is unattainable... right?

0.name: Marvelous Sword-Dance (Modified)
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 3 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash. 

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon
1.description: Directs a Spirit-Warding Lamp to fire off a Troubleshooter Shot at opponents, dealing Electro DMG. After the Troubleshooter Shot hits, it will create 2 After-Sales Service Rounds that will automatically track nearby opponents and deal Electro DMG. It is said that Dori can fix any problem for you... for the right price.

3.name: Alcazarzaray's Exactitude
3.description: Summons forth the Jinni within the lamp to give the client various kinds of aid. Jinni Connects to a nearby character. The connected character will: · Continuously restore HP based on Dori's Max HP. · Continuously regenerate Energy. · Be affected by Electro. When the connector between the Jinni and the character touches opponents, it will deal one instance of Electro DMG to them every 0.4s. Only one Jinni can exist at one time. "Hmm? You'll pick this lamp, will you? Oh my, you've got good taste! Unfortunately, there's no price on this treasure — comparable, I'd say, to how you will not sell that mascot by your side for any price in the world."

4.name: An Eye for Gold
4.description: After a character connected to the <color=#FFD780FF>Jinni</color> triggers an Electro-Charged, Lunar-Charged, Superconduct, Overloaded, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, Electro Swirl, or Electro Crystallize reaction, the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon</color> is decreased by 1s.\nThis effect can be triggered once every 3s.

5.name: Compound Interest
5.description: When the Troubleshooter Shots or After-Sales Service Rounds from <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon</color> hit opponents, Dori will restore 5 Elemental Energy for every 100% Energy Recharge possessed.\nPer Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon, only one instance of Energy restoration can be triggered and a maximum of 15 Energy can be restored this way.

6.name: Unexpected Order
6.description: Has a 25% chance to recover some of the materials used when crafting Character and Weapon Materials.

0.name: Additional Investment
0.description: The number of After-Sales Service Rounds created by <color=#FFD780FF>Troubleshooter Shots</color> is increased by 1.

1.name: Special Franchise
1.description: When you are in combat and the <color=#FFD780FF>Jinni</color> heals the character it is connected to, it will fire a Jinni Toop from that character's position that deals 50% of Dori's ATK DMG.

2.name: Wonders Never Cease
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Alcazarzaray's Exactitude</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Discretionary Supplement
3.description: The character connected to the <color=#FFD780FF>Jinni</color> will obtain the following buffs based on their current HP and Energy:\n·When their HP is lower than 50%, they gain 50% Incoming Healing Bonus.\n·When their Energy is less than 50%, they gain 30% Energy Recharge.

4.name: Value for Mora
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Sprinkling Weight
5.description: Dori gains the following effects for 3s after using <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon</color>:\n·<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro Infusion</color>.\n·When Normal Attacks hit opponents, all nearby party members will heal HP equivalent to 4% of Dori's Max HP. This type of healing can occur once every 0.1s.

fetter.title: "The Undying Fire"
fetter.detail: A dragon born from M's pen, who came to alight in the human world. His "story" continues to unfold.

costume.name: A Gift From the Stars
costume.description: Durin's outfit. As the smoke from the alchemical array gradually dissipated, a glimmer of starlight drew Durin's gaze toward the window. In the reflection in the glass, he saw himself dressed in elegant garb, like a prince straight out of a fairy tale. When he looked down at himself again, he realized he was wearing that very same outfit. But who could've given him this gift? The stars outside merely twinkled soundlessly, providing no answers.

costume.name: Toward the Distant Horizon
costume.description: Durin's outfit. Durin's original outfit has received a new lease of life now that he's taken up his mother's pen. Ultimately, he bid farewell to the past once painted by its previous owner. When the lock on his heart faded away, the distant horizon his wish now points to became the direction in which his story continues to unfold.

nameCard.name: Durin: Radiant Heart
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nThe ceaseless drumming in his chest reminds him thus: "You carry the hopes of a distant past. Your soul is resplendent and nascent, and within you burns a fervor no winter blizzard can quench."

0.name: Radiant Wingslash
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 consecutive sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform a slash toward the front.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Binary Form: Convergence and Division
1.description:
Purify the substance of souls and wishes to undergo {LINK#N11230001}<color=#FFD780FF>Essential Transmutation</color>{/LINK}. While transmuted, Durin's Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Binary Form: Convergence and Division</color> will be replaced with the special Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Transmutation: Confirmation of Purity</color>, and the Normal Attack <color=#FFD780FF>Radiant Wingslash</color> will be replaced with the special Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Transmutation: Denial of Darkness</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Transmutation: Confirmation of Purity</color>
Deal 1 instance of <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color> to nearby opponents, reverse Essential Transmutation, and enter the <color=#FFD780FF>Confirmation of Purity</color> state for 30s.

<color=#FFD780FF>Transmutation: Denial of Darkness</color>
Deal 3 consecutive instances of <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> to opponents in front, reverse Essential Transmutation, and enter the <color=#FFD780FF>Denial of Darkness</color> state for 30s.

When Durin enters the <color=#FFD780FF>Confirmation of Purity</color> or <color=#FFD780FF>Denial of Darkness</color> state while in battle, he will restore a certain amount of Elemental Energy. Elemental Energy can be restored this way once every 6s.

3.name: Principle of Purity: As the Light Shifts
3.description:
Unleash the power of the "Beast" in different ways. Durin can use different Elemental Bursts based on his {LINK#N11230001}<color=#FFD780FF>Essential Transmutation</color>{/LINK} state.

<color=#FFD780FF>Principle of Purity: As the Light Shifts</color>
When Durin is in the <color=#FFD780FF>Confirmation of Purity</color> state, he will use the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Principle of Purity: As the Light Shifts</color>, dealing 3 instances of <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color> to opponents in front, and manifesting his power in the <color=#FFD780FF>Dragon of White Flame</color> form. The Dragon of White Flame will follow the current active character and attack nearby opponents at intervals, dealing <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color>. This DMG is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

<color=#FFD780FF>Principle of Darkness: As the Stars Smolder</color>
When Durin is in the <color=#FFD780FF>Denial of Darkness</color> state, he will use the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Principle of Darkness: As the Stars Smolder</color>, dealing 3 instances of <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color> to opponents in front, and manifesting his power in the <color=#FFD780FF>Dragon of Dark Decay</color> form. The Dragon of Dark Decay will follow the current active character and periodically attack a single nearby opponent, dealing <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>. This DMG is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

When Durin is not in a special state as a result of Essential Transmutation, he will use the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Principle of Purity: As the Light Shifts</color>.

Principle of Darkness: As the Stars Smolder DMG|{param4:F1P}+{param5:F1P}+{param6:F1P}
Principle of Purity: As the Light Shifts DMG|{param1:F1P}+{param2:F1P}+{param3:F1P}

Principle of Darkness: As the Stars Smolder DMG|{param4:F1P}+{param5:F1P}+{param6:F1P}

4.name: Light Manifest of the Divine Calculus
4.description:
Durin will trigger different buffs depending on the form that his power manifests as when he unleashes his Elemental Burst. When that form is:

<color=#FFD780FF>Dragon of White Flame</color>
After nearby party members trigger Burning, Overloaded, Pyro Swirl, or Pyro Crystallize reactions on an opponent, or deal <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> or <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro DMG</color> to an opponent affected by Burning, that opponent's <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro RES</color>, and the RES for the corresponding Element involved in the reaction, are decreased by 20% for 6s.

<color=#FFD780FF>Dragon of Dark Decay</color>
Durin's Vaporize DMG is increased by 40% and his Melt DMG is increased by 40%.

5.name: Chaos Formed Like the Night
5.description: After unleashing an Elemental Burst, Durin gains the Primordial Fusion of Forms effect for 20s: Durin gains 10 stacks of Primordial Fusion. When a periodic attack from <color=#FFD780FF>Dragon of White Flame</color> or <color=#FFD780FF>Dragon of Dark Decay</color> deals DMG, 1 stack of Primordial Fusion will be consumed to increase the DMG dealt by 3% of the original DMG for every 100 ATK. A maximum of 75% additional DMG can be dealt this way. When a single attack from <color=#FFD780FF>Dragon of White Flame</color> or <color=#FFD780FF>Dragon of Dark Decay</color> hits multiple opponents, only one stack of Primordial Fusion is consumed.\nPrimordial Fusion stacks are reset when the Elemental Burst is unleashed again.

6.name: Echoes of the Surging Earth
6.description: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Mondstadt Expedition for 20 hours.

9.name: Witch's Eve Rite: Ode to Ascension
9.description:
After completing <color=#FFD780FF>Witch's Homework: Of This World</color>, Durin will become a <color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei</color> character. When the party includes at least 2 Hexerei characters, you will gain the <color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei: Secret Rite</color> effect, which enhances Hexerei characters.

<color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei: Secret Rite</color>
Increases all effects of the Ascension Talent {LINK#P1232101}<color=#FFD780FF>Light Manifest of the Divine Calculus</color>{/LINK} (except for Duration) by 75%.

0.name: Adamah's Redemption
0.description:
After casting his Elemental Burst, Durin's effects will vary depending on the form of his Elemental Burst:
· <color=#FFD780FF>Principle of Purity: As the Light Shifts</color>: All other nearby party members gain 20 stacks of <color=#FFD780FF>Cycle of Enlightenment</color> lasting 20s. When nearby active characters deal Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Plunging Attack, Elemental Skill, or Elemental Burst DMG, 1 stack of Cycle of Enlightenment will be consumed to increase the DMG dealt by 60% of Durin's ATK. Stack counts for characters in the party who have Cycle of Enlightenment are managed individually.
· <color=#FFD780FF>Principle of Darkness: As the Stars Smolder</color>: Durin gains 20 stacks of <color=#FFD780FF>Cycle of Enlightenment</color> lasting 20s. When Durin deals Elemental Burst DMG, 2 stacks of Cycle of Enlightenment will be consumed to increase the DMG dealt by 150% of Durin's ATK.

When an Elemental Burst is used, <color=#FFD780FF>Cycle of Enlightenment</color> stacks will be refreshed.

1.name: Unground Visions
1.description: For 20s after Durin uses an Elemental Burst, after nearby party members trigger Vaporize, Melt, Burning, Overloaded, Pyro Swirl, or Pyro Crystallize reactions, or deal <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> or <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro DMG</color> to an opponent affected by Burning, all nearby party members gain a 50% increase to their <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> and to the corresponding elemental DMG involved in the reaction for 6s.

2.name: Flame Mirror's Revelation
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11235}Principle of Purity: As the Light Shifts{/LINK}</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Emanare's Source
3.description: Durin's Elemental Burst DMG is increased by 40%. Additionally, when effects that consume <color=#FFD780FF>Cycle of Enlightenment</color> stacks are triggered as part of the Constellation <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#T1231}Adamah's Redemption{/LINK}</color>, there is a 30% chance that no Cycle of Enlightenment stacks will be consumed.

4.name: Scouring Flame's Sundering
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11232}Binary Form: Convergence and Division{/LINK}</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Dual Birth
5.description:
Durin's Elemental Burst DMG ignores 30% of opponents' DEF.
Additionally, Durin's Elemental Bursts <color=#FFD780FF>Principle of Purity: As the Light Shifts</color> and <color=#FFD780FF>Principle of Darkness: As the Stars Smolder</color> are each enhanced:
· After <color=#FFD780FF>Principle of Purity: As the Light Shifts</color> and <color=#FFD780FF>Dragon of White Flame</color> hit an opponent, that opponent's DEF is decreased by 30% for 6s.
· DMG from <color=#FFD780FF>Principle of Darkness: As the Stars Smolder</color> and <color=#FFD780FF>Dragon of Dark Decay</color> will ignore an additional 40% of opponents' DEF.

N11230001.name: Essential Transmutation
N11230001.description: After unleashing the Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Binary Form: Convergence and Division</color>, Durin gains this effect for 6s.\nWhile the effect is active, press the Elemental Skill button to enter the <color=#FFD780FF>Confirmation of Purity</color> state, or press the Normal Attack button to enter the <color=#FFD780FF>Denial of Darkness</color> state.\nDurin will gain different buffs and can unleash different Elemental Bursts while in these states.

fetter.title: A Thousand Scents Traced
fetter.detail: A Fontainian perfumer, one who bottles secrets.

costume.name: Ambrosial Verdance
costume.description: Emilie's outfit. In homage to the launch of a classic perfume, the designer of this emerald-green dress drew inspiration from the concept of "tactual fragrances." It is now part of Emilie's collection.

nameCard.name: Emilie: Base Note
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\n"The top note is sweet, the middle rich but not distracting, and the base — Ah! Such a faint fragrance! Such an exquisite perfume."\nOrders flow in and out in an endless stream, and to prevent any scents from disturbing her work, Emilie very seldom uses perfume herself. Alas. When will she have the chance to delight in those base notes?

0.name: Shadow-Hunting Spear (Custom)
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward slash.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Fragrance Extraction
1.description: Creates a Lumidouce Case that deals AoE Dendro DMG. Lumidouce Case ·Fires Puffs of Puredew at nearby opponents at intervals, dealing Dendro DMG. ·When nearby opponents are affected by Burning, they will give off Scents at intervals, and 1 Scent can be created this way every 2s. The Lumidouce Case collects nearby Scents. The Lumidouce Case will level up after gathering 2 of them, after which it will fire 1 extra Puff of Puredew when firing, while the DMG dealt by and DMG AoE of the above attack will also be increased. ·1 Lumidouce Case created by Emilie herself can exist at any one time. The Case starts at Level 1 and can go up to Level 2. If the Case does not collect any Scents for 8s while it is on the field, it will go back to Level 1. Arkhe: Pneuma At intervals, after Emilie creates a Lumidouce Case this way, a Spiritbreath Thorn will descend in front of her and pierce her opponent, dealing Pneuma-aligned Dendro DMG. "The world is an endless harmony of fragrance, color, and song."

3.name: Aromatic Explication
3.description: Guiding the fragrances collected within the Case, Emilie converts them into pure Dendro energy, creating a Level 3 Lumidouce Case and stowing existing Cases away. While it exists, the Level 3 Lumidouce Case will not gather nearby Scents, but it will continuously cause Scented Dew to descend, attacking opponents within range and dealing Dendro DMG. During this time, 1 drop of Scented Dew will descend every 0.3 seconds, and 1 opponent can become the target every 0.7 seconds. When the duration ends, a Level 1 Lumidouce Case will be recreated. If a Lumidouce Case was stowed away when using Aromatic Explication, then the Case that was stowed away will be deployed instead, and its duration will be reset. While Aromatic Explication is active, the Elemental Skill "Fragrance Extraction" will not create a Lumidouce Case. No matter the perfume, it will begin to change the instant it comes into contact with the air, before finally dissipating amidst the whispers of wind, trees, and grass. In that sense, no two people will appreciate the exact same fragrance. So it is for the paths taken by all who live. In that sense, you can consider perfumes an explication of human life.

4.name: Lingering Fragrance
4.description: Each time it collects 2 <color=#FFD780FF>Scents</color>, the Level 2 Lumidouce Case will consume Scents and release Cleardew Cologne that deals <color=#99FF88FF>AoE Dendro DMG</color> equal to 600% of Emilie's ATK to opponents. This DMG is not considered Elemental Skill DMG.

5.name: Rectification
5.description: Emilie deals increased DMG to Burning opponents based on her ATK, with every 1,000 ATK increasing DMG dealt by 15%. The maximum DMG bonus that can be gained this way is 36%.

6.name: Headspace Capture
6.description: When the Lumidouce Case created by Emilie is on the field, all party members gain 85% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro RES</color> against Burning DMG.

0.name: Light Fragrance Leaching
0.description: Increases the DMG dealt by <color=#FFD780FF>Fragrance Extraction</color> and her Ascension Talent's Cleardew Cologne "Lingering Fragrance" by 20%. The latter requires unlocking said Ascension Talent first.\nAdditionally, when nearby party members trigger the Burning reaction on opponents or deal <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro DMG</color> to Burning opponents, they will generate an additional <color=#FFD780FF>Scent</color>. This effect can be triggered once every 2.9s.

1.name: Lakelight Top Note
1.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Fragrance Extraction</color>, <color=#FFD780FF>Aromatic Explication</color>, or Cleardew Cologne produced by the Ascension Talent "Lingering Fragrance" (the last of which requires Ascension Talent activation) hits opponents, those opponents' <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro RES</color> is decreased by 30% for 10s.

2.name: Exquisite Essence
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Fragrance Extraction</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Lumidouce Heart Note
3.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Aromatic Explication</color>'s duration is increased by 2s. The interval between opponents being selected as the target for Scented Dew is decreased by 0.3s.

4.name: Puredew Aroma
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Aromatic Explication</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Marcotte Sillage
5.description:
When using <color=#FFD780FF>Fragrance Extraction</color> or <color=#FFD780FF>Aromatic Explication</color>, Emilie will gain Abiding Fragrance for 5s.
While this is active, after Emilie uses Normal or Charged Attacks, she will generate 1 Scent, and her Normal and Charged Attack DMG will be converted into <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro DMG</color> that cannot be overridden, and the DMG dealt will be increased by 300% of Emilie's ATK.

The Abiding Fragrance effect will be removed after 4 Scents are created this way or after its duration expires. Abiding Fragrance can be triggered once every 12s.

fetter.title: Tasteful Excellence
fetter.detail: The ex-head chef of Hotel Debord, renowned throughout Fontaine as the Patissiere Supreme and vanguard of precision gastronomy. Has incomparably strict standards when it comes to cooking.

costume.name: Sorbet Honey Pie
costume.description: Escoffier's outfit. Befitting the "Patissiere Supreme," the finely sewn flying sleeves on Escoffier's work uniform are as refined as the cakes she bakes, inevitably evoking thoughts of pure, exquisite sweetness.

nameCard.name: Escoffier: Charm
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nFor Escoffier, a certain relationship exists between rhythm and flavor. Why, then, does she not fuel her compositions with delicious food? The answer is quite simple — consistent flavors are reliable and comforting, but no one wants to hear the same song over and over.

0.name: Kitchen Skills
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 3 consecutive spear strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward thrust.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Low-Temperature Cooking
1.description:
Behold the true meaning of "cooking"! Escoffier will demonstrate different cooking techniques when you Tap or Hold this skill, but rest assured, each of them is Fontaine's pride and joy.

<color=#FFD780FF>Tap</color>
Activates her All-Spectrum Multi-Use Cooking Mek in its Cold Storage mode and deals <color=#99FFFFFF>AoE Cryo DMG</color> to nearby opponents.

<color=#FFD780FF>Cooking Mek: Cold Storage Mode</color>
Follows the current active character and fires Frosty Parfaits at nearby opponents at intervals, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Arkhe: Ousia</color>
At intervals, Escoffier will summon a Surging Blade when activating her Cooking Mek in Cold Storage mode, dealing Ousia-aligned <color=#99FFFFFF>AoE Cryo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Hold</color>
Activates her All-Spectrum Multi-Use Cooking Mek's {LINK#N11120002}<color=#FFD780FF>Off-the-Cuff Cookery Mode</color>{/LINK}.

3.name: Scoring Cuts
3.description: Displaying her exceptional knife skills, Escoffier deals <color=#99FFFFFF>AoE Cryo DMG</color> and restores HP to all nearby party members based on her ATK.

4.name: Better to Salivate Than Medicate
4.description: After using the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11125}Scoring Cuts{/LINK}</color>, Escoffier will obtain the Rehab Diet effect for 9s: Restores HP for nearby active characters every 1s based on 138.24% of Escoffier's ATK.

5.name: Inspiration-Immersed Seasoning
5.description: When there are 1/2/3/4 <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color> or <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> characters in the party, Escoffier will decrease the <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro RES</color> and <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo RES</color> of any opponents hit by her Elemental Skill, <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11122}Low-Temperature Cooking{/LINK}</color>, or her Elemental Burst, <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11125}Scoring Cuts{/LINK}</color>, by 5%/10%/15%/55% for 12s.

6.name: Constant Off-the-Cuff Cookery
6.description:
#When using the Hold form of her Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11122}Low-Temperature Cooking{/LINK}</color>, Escoffier will activate her All-Spectrum Multi-Use Cooking Mek in its Off-the-Cuff Cookery mode.

<color=#FFD780FF>Cooking Mek: Off-the-Cuff Cookery Mode</color>
· Places the Cooking Mek on the field. The Cooking Mek can absorb elemental attacks. When the absorbed elemental energy hits a certain limit, Escoffier can convert the ingredients placed within it into wonderful food.
· Escoffier needs time to purchase new ingredients, so she can only make a certain number of dishes like this each week. The number of dishes Escoffier can make resets every Monday at 4:00 AM {TIMEZONE}.

0.name: Pre-Dinner Dance for Your Taste Buds
0.description: When 4 party members are <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color> or <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>, all nearby party members will have their <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> CRIT DMG increased by 60% for 15s after Escoffier uses her Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11122}Low-Temperature Cooking{/LINK}</color> or Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11125}Scoring Cuts{/LINK}</color>.\nYou must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Inspiration-Immersed Seasoning."

1.name: Fresh, Fragrant Stew Is an Art
1.description: When Escoffier activates her Cooking Mek in its {LINK#N11120001}<color=#FFD780FF>Cold Storage Mode</color>{/LINK}, she will gain the "Freshly-Prepped Delicacy" effect for 15s. During this time, Escoffier will gain 5 Cold Dish stacks. When nearby active characters apart from Escoffier deal <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> with a Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attack, or an Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, they will expend 1 Cold Dish stack to increase their DMG dealt by 240% of Escoffier's ATK.\nIf you hit multiple opponents with a single instance of <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>, Cold Dish stacks will be consumed based on the number of opponents hit.

2.name: The Bakery Magic of Caramel Browning
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11122}Low-Temperature Cooking{/LINK}</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Secret Rosemary Recipe
3.description: {LINK#P1122101}<color=#FFD780FF>Rehab Diet</color>{/LINK} lasts 6 more seconds. While it is active, you have a chance of healing 100% extra HP and restoring 2 Energy to Escoffier when you trigger healing through <color=#FFD780FF>Rehab Diet</color>. This chance corresponds to Escoffier's CRIT Rate. You can trigger this effect 7 times during any one <color=#FFD780FF>Rehab Diet</color>'s duration.\nYou must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Better to Salivate Than Medicate."

4.name: Symphony of a Thousand Sauces
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11125}Scoring Cuts{/LINK}</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Tea Parties Bursting With Color
5.description: {LINK#N11120001}<color=#FFD780FF>Cooking Mek: Cold Storage Mode</color>{/LINK} is enhanced:\n· When your party's active character's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks hit opponents, Cooking Mek: Cold Storage Mode will fire off another Special-Grade Frosty Parfait, dealing 500% of Escoffier's ATK as <color=#99FFFFFF>AoE Cryo DMG</color>. This DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG.\nThis effect can be triggered once every 0.5s, and this effect can be triggered 6 times within the duration of one Cooking Mek: Cold Storage Mode.

N11120002.name: Off-the-Cuff Cookery Mode
N11120002.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Cooking Mek: Off-the-Cuff Cookery Mode</color>\n· Places the Cooking Mek on the field. The Cooking Mek can absorb elemental attacks. When the absorbed elemental energy hits a certain limit, Escoffier can convert the ingredients placed within it into wonderful food.\n· Escoffier needs time to purchase new ingredients, so she can only make a certain number of dishes like this each week. The number of dishes Escoffier can make resets every Monday at 4:00 AM.

N11120001.name: Cold Storage Mode
N11120001.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Tap</color>
Activates her All-Spectrum Multi-Use Cooking Mek in its Cold Storage mode and deals <color=#99FFFFFF>AoE Cryo DMG</color> to nearby opponents.

<color=#FFD780FF>Cooking Mek: Cold Storage Mode</color>
Follows the current active character and fires Frosty Parfaits at nearby opponents at intervals, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>.

fetter.title: Dance of the Shimmering Wave
fetter.detail: The Spindrift Knight, a scion of the old aristocracy, and the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. The reason for which a descendant of the ancient nobles might join the Knights remains a great mystery in Mondstadt to this very day.

costume.name: Wavecrest Waltz
costume.description: Eula's outfit. Consummate elegance shines through in this neat and smart knight's uniform.

nameCard.name: Eula: Ice-Sealed
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nA cold heart is but a shell to protect oneself.

0.name: Favonius Bladework - Edel
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Icetide Vortex
1.description: #Sharp frost, swift blade. {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Slashes swiftly, dealing Cryo DMG. When it hits an opponent, Eula gains a stack of Grimheart that stacks up to 2 times. These stacks can only be gained once every 0.3s. Grimheart Increases Eula's resistance to interruption and DEF. Hold Wielding her sword, Eula consumes all the stacks of Grimheart and lashes forward, dealing AoE Cryo DMG to opponents in front of her. If Grimheart stacks are consumed, surrounding opponents will have their Physical RES and Cryo RES decreased. Each consumed stack of Grimheart will be converted into an Icewhirl Brand that deals Cryo DMG to nearby opponents. "So the waves roiled, swallowing the crown of the nobles. And ever after did each drop amidst the icy waves reflect a golden crown, each and every droplet of the spray shining with its light."

3.name: Glacial Illumination
3.description: Brandishes her greatsword, dealing Cryo DMG to nearby opponents and creating a Lightfall Sword that follows her around for a duration of up to 7s. While present, the Lightfall Sword increases Eula's resistance to interruption. When Eula's own Normal Attack, Elemental Skill, and Elemental Burst deal DMG to opponents, they will charge the Lightfall Sword, which can gain an energy stack once every 0.1s. Once its duration ends, the Lightfall Sword will descend and explode violently, dealing Physical DMG to nearby opponents. This DMG scales on the number of energy stacks the Lightfall Sword has accumulated. If Eula leaves the field, the Lightfall Sword will explode immediately. It is easy to sink. But even so, she desires to freeze this oncoming tide.

4.name: Roiling Rime
4.description: If 2 stacks of Grimheart are consumed upon unleashing the Holding Mode of <color=#FFD780FF>Icetide Vortex</color>, a Shattered Lightfall Sword will be created that will explode immediately, dealing 50% of the basic Physical DMG dealt by a Lightfall Sword created by <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Illumination</color>.

5.name: Wellspring of War-Lust
5.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Illumination</color> is cast, the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Icetide Vortex</color> is reset and Eula gains 1 stack of Grimheart.

6.name: Aristocratic Introspection
6.description: When Eula crafts Character Talent Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

0.name: Tidal Illusion
0.description: Every time <color=#FFD780FF>Icetide Vortex</color>'s Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s.\nEach stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

1.name: Lady of Seafoam
1.description: #Decreases the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Icetide Vortex</color>'s Holding Mode, rendering it identical to {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tapping}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} CD.

2.name: Lawrence Pedigree
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Illumination</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: The Obstinacy of One's Inferiors
3.description: Lightfall Swords deal 25% increased DMG against opponents with less than 50% HP.

4.name: Chivalric Quality
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Icetide Vortex</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Noble Obligation
5.description: Lightfall Swords created by <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Illumination</color> start with 5 stacks of energy. Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts have a 50% chance to grant the Lightfall Sword an additional stack of energy.

fetter.title: Enigmatic Machinist
fetter.detail: A researcher from "one hundred years ago." She enjoys self-identifying as everyone's senior, and has significant knowledge of ancient scripts and machines of all kinds.

costume.name: Pristine Elegance
costume.description: Faruzan's outfit. The relatively plain yet elegant style represents her unfaltering purity. This style was very popular in the Akademiya a hundred years ago, but has now become an uncommon sight.

nameCard.name: Faruzan: Sealed Secret
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\n"A—Anyway! Next time, remember to refer to me as Madam Faruzan before you ask a question! Seriously..."

0.name: Parthian Shot
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Performs a more precise <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, mighty winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, hitting opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Wind Realm of Nasamjnin
1.description: Faruzan deploys a polyhedron that deals AoE Anemo DMG to nearby opponents. She will also enter the Manifest Gale state. While in the Manifest Gale state, Faruzan's next fully charged shot will consume this state and will become a Hurricane Arrow that contains high-pressure currents. This arrow deals Anemo DMG based on the DMG of a fully charged Aimed Shot from "Normal Attack: Parthian Shot." Pressurized Collapse The Hurricane Arrow will apply a Pressurized Collapse effect to the opponent or character hit. This effect will be removed after a short delay, creating a vortex that deals AoE Anemo DMG and pulls nearby objects and opponents in. If the Hurricane Arrow does not hit any opponent or character, it will create a Pressurized Collapse effect at its point of impact. The vortex DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG. The winds of truth buffet the spirits of those who seek truth, dispersing the miasma of preconception.

3.name: The Wind's Secret Ways
3.description: Faruzan deploys a Dazzling Polyhedron that unleashes a Whirlwind Pulse and deals AoE Anemo DMG. While the Dazzling Polyhedron persists, it will continuously move along a triangular path. Once it reaches each corner of that triangular path, it will unleash 1 more Whirlwind Pulse. Whirlwind Pulse ·When the Whirlwind Pulse is unleashed, it will apply Perfidious Wind's Bale to nearby opponents, decreasing their Anemo RES. ·The Whirlwind Pulse will also apply Prayerful Wind's Benefit to all nearby party members when it is unleashed, granting them an Anemo DMG Bonus. One must have respect for the unknown wisdom that one might find hidden in ancient ruins.

4.name: Impetuous Flow
4.description: When Faruzan is in the Manifest Gale state created by <color=#FFD780FF>Wind Realm of Nasamjnin</color>, the amount of time taken to charge a shot is decreased by 60%, and she can apply <color=#FFD780FF>The Wind's Secret Ways</color>' Perfidious Wind's Bale to opponents who are hit by the vortex created by Pressurized Collapse.

5.name: Lost Wisdom of the Seven Caverns
5.description: When characters affected by <color=#FFD780FF>The Wind's Secret Ways</color>' Prayerful Wind's Benefit deal <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color> using Normal, Charged, Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, or Elemental Bursts to opponents, they will gain the Hurricane Guard effect: This DMG will be increased based on 32% of Faruzan's Base ATK. 1 instance of Hurricane Guard can occur once every 0.8s. This DMG Bonus will be cleared after Prayerful Wind's Benefit expires or after the effect is triggered once.

6.name: Tomes Light the Path
6.description: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Sumeru Expedition for 20 hours.

0.name: Truth by Any Means
0.description: Faruzan can fire off a maximum of 2 Hurricane Arrows using fully charged Aimed Shots while under the effect of a single Manifest Gale created by <color=#FFD780FF>Wind Realm of Nasamjnin</color>.

1.name: Overzealous Intellect
1.description: The duration of the Dazzling Polyhedron created by <color=#FFD780FF>The Wind's Secret Ways</color> is increased by 6s.

2.name: Spirit-Orchard Stroll
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Wind Realm of Nasamjnin</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Divine Comprehension
3.description: The vortex created by <color=#FFD780FF>Pressurized Collapses</color> will restore Energy to Faruzan based on the number of opponents hit: If it hits 1 opponent, it will restore 2 Energy for Faruzan. Each additional opponent hit will restore 0.5 more Energy for Faruzan.\nA maximum of 4 Energy can be restored to her per vortex.

4.name: Wonderland of Rumination
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>The Wind's Secret Ways</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: The Wondrous Path of Truth
5.description: Characters affected by <color=#FFD780FF>The Wind's Secret Ways</color>' Prayerful Wind's Benefit have 40% increased CRIT DMG when they deal <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>. When the active character deals DMG while affected by Prayerful Wind's Benefit, they will apply Pressurized Collapse to the opponent damaged. This effect can be triggered once every 3s. This CD is shared between all party members.

fetter.title: Prinzessin der Verurteilung!
fetter.detail: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

cv.JP: 内田真礼 & 増谷康紀

costume.name: Dunkelnacht Sakrament
costume.description: Fischl's outfit. The Prinzessin der Verurteilung's customary vestments during her sojourn upon this realm.

costume.name: Ein Immernachtstraum
costume.description: A ceremonial outfit for the Prinzessin. May she who is noble retain her courage, sincerity, and kindness forever, such that no evil shall ever overcome her.

nameCard.name: Fischl: Night Raven
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nA raven dark as midnight with wings that can block out the sun. "I permit thee to conceive his likeness upon such decoration!"

0.name: Bolts of Downfall
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Performs a more precise <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, the dark lightning spirits of Immernachtreich shall heed the call of their Prinzessin and indwell the enchanted arrowhead. When fully indwelt, the Rachsüchtig Blitz shall deal immense <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Nightrider
1.description: #Summons Oz. The night raven forged of darkness and lightning descends upon the land, dealing Electro DMG in a small AoE. For the ability's duration, Oz will continuously attack nearby opponents with Freikugel. Hold to adjust the location Oz will be summoned to. {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} again any time during the ability's duration to once again summon him to Fischl's side. "My time is most precious, and I shall not waste it on the likes of you... Go, Oz, fall upon them, and bring down upon them your Rachsüchtig Blitz, that which tears open the long night." —Flowers for Princess Fischl (IV): Farewell Frau Welt

3.name: Midnight Phantasmagoria
3.description: Summons Oz to spread his twin wings of twilight and defend Fischl. Has the following properties during the ability's duration: ·Fischl takes on Oz's form, greatly increasing her Movement Speed. ·Strikes nearby opponents with lightning, dealing Electro DMG to opponents she comes into contact with. Each opponent can only be struck once. ·Once this ability's effects end, Oz will remain on the battlefield and attack his Prinzessin's foes. If Oz is already on the field, then this will reset the duration of his presence. "...In the hordes of beasts that follow the cursed blood, only Prince Nachtraben, who bore witness to the extinction of a thousand worlds, knows her true greatness. Thus the night wings he spreads are his eternal promise to protect Her Royal Highness." —Flowers for Princess Fischl (I): End Time Zersetzung

4.name: Stellar Predator
4.description: When Fischl hits Oz with a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Oz brings down Thundering Retribution, dealing <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color> equal to 152.7% of the arrow's DMG.

5.name: Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex
5.description: If your current active character triggers an <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro-related Elemental Reaction</color> when Oz is on the field, the opponent shall be stricken with Thundering Retribution that deals <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> equal to 80% of Fischl's ATK.

6.name: Mein Hausgarten
6.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

9.name: Witch's Eve Rite: Phantasmal Nocturne
9.description:
After completing <color=#FFD780FF>Witch's Homework: Of the Unexpected</color>, Fischl will become a <color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei</color> character. When the party includes at least 2 Hexerei characters, you will gain the <color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei: Secret Rite</color> effect, which enhances Hexerei characters.

<color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei: Secret Rite</color>
Hark, Prince Nachtraben, Ozvaldo Hrafnavins, he who has witnessed the fall of countless worlds. Sing now the starry septet for your sovereign, for this is the moment of deepest sin, when the gathered souls at the end of causality shatter the darkness of fate.
Additionally, when Oz is on the field, party members will gain additional buff effects:
· After a nearby party member triggers an Overloaded reaction, Fischl and other nearby active party members have their ATK increased by 22.5% for 10s.
· After a nearby party member triggers an Electro-Charged or Lunar-Charged reaction, Fischl and other nearby active party members have their Elemental Mastery increased by 90 for 10s.

0.name: Gaze of the Deep
0.description: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl performs a Normal Attack against an opponent, Oz fires a coordinated attack, dealing DMG equal to 22% of Fischl's ATK.

1.name: Devourer of All Sins
1.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Nightrider</color> is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

2.name: Wings of Nightmare
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Nightrider</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
3.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Midnight Phantasmagoria</color> is used, it deals 222% of ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.\nWhen the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

4.name: Against the Fleeing Light
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Midnight Phantasmagoria</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Evernight Raven
5.description: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs coordinated attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.
5.descriptionBuff: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs coordinated attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.\nAfter Oz performs a coordinated attack, the increased ATK and Elemental Mastery effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Witch's Eve Rite: Phantasmal Nocturne</color> are further increased by 100% for 10s.

fetter.title: Shadowy Lights, Stranger Wights
fetter.detail: A Lightkeeper of Nod-Krai, guardian of a lighthouse and graveyard on a northern isle. An enigmatic gentleman, cultured and courtly.

costume.name: Nocturne
costume.description: Flins's outfit. A black uniform paired with a silver chain at his waist lends this gentleman an air of composed dignity. Night after night, he raises his azure lantern and stands vigil over the frigid seas and islands of Nod-Krai.

nameCard.name: Flins: Oathkeeper's Lantern
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nAs the saying goes, "Will-o'-the-wisps are like love — most visible in the barren swamp, and just as likely to lead you into danger." Of course, the saying only relates to the natural phenomenon.

0.name: Pocztowy Demonspear
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform a forward spear throw.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Ancient Rite: Arcane Light
1.description:
Flins summons forth the ancient power concealed within his lamp and switches to his <color=#FFD780FF>Manifest Flame</color> form. This form has the following characteristics:
· Flins's Normal and Charged Attacks deal <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> that cannot be overridden by other Elemental infusions, and he is unable to perform Plunging Attacks.
· His interruption resistance is increased.
· His Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Ancient Rite: Arcane Light</color> is replaced with the special Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Northland Spearstorm</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Northland Spearstorm</color>
Flins summons a flurry of spears in front, dealing <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color> and causing his Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Ancient Ritual: Cometh the Night</color> to be replaced with the special Elemental Burst {LINK#N11200001}<color=#FFD780FF>Thunderous Symphony</color>{/LINK} for the next 6s.
The base CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Northland Spearstorm</color> is 6s and will not be affected by other effects.

3.name: Ancient Ritual: Cometh the Night
3.description:
Flins unleashes the true power of his lamp, dealing <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color> and, after a short delay, dealing 2 instances of middle-phase and 1 instance of final-phase <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color>, all of which are considered Lunar-Charged DMG.
<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>: Flins's Skill is enhanced: If there are thunderclouds nearby, Flins will deal an additional 2 instances of middle-phase Lunar-Charged <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color>.

After using the special Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Northland Spearstorm</color>, Flins's Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Ancient Ritual: Cometh the Night</color> will be replaced with the special Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Thunderous Symphony</color> for the next 6s.

<color=#FFD780FF>Thunderous Symphony</color>
Consume less Elemental Energy to unleash a special Elemental Burst. Flins deals a single instance of <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color> that is considered Lunar-Charged DMG.
<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>: Flins's Skill is enhanced: If there are thunderclouds nearby, Flins will deal an additional instance of Lunar-Charged <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color>.

4.name: Symphony of Winter
4.description: Flins will gain a corresponding buff effect based on the party's <color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign</color>.\n\n<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>: Lunar-Charged reactions triggered by Flins will deal an additional 20% DMG.

5.name: Whispering Flame
5.description: Flins's Elemental Mastery is increased by 8% of his ATK. The maximum increase obtainable this way is 160.

6.name: Moonsign Benediction: Old World Secrets
6.description: When a party member triggers an Electro-Charged reaction, it will be converted into the Lunar-Charged reaction, with every 100 ATK that Flins has increasing Lunar-Charged's Base DMG by 0.7%, up to a maximum of 14%.\n\nAdditionally, when Flins is in the party, the party's <color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign</color> will increase by 1 level.

8.name: A Light in the Dark
8.description: Displays the location of nearby <color=#FFD780FF>resources unique to Nod-Krai</color> on the mini-map.\nAdditionally, Flins appears to be able to decipher the whispers of the Wild Hunt...

0.name: Part the Veil of Snow
0.description: The basic cooldown of the special Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Northland Spearstorm</color> is reduced to 4s.\nAdditionally, when party members trigger Lunar-Charged reactions, Flins will recover 8 Elemental Energy. This effect can occur once every 5.5s.

1.name: The Devil's Wall
1.description: For the next 6s after using the special Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Northland Spearstorm</color>, when Flins's next Normal Attack hits an opponent, it will deal an additional 50% of Flins's ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color>. This DMG is considered Lunar-Charged DMG.\n<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>: While Flins is on the field, after his <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> attacks hit an opponent, that opponent's <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro RES</color> will be decreased by 25% for 7s.

2.name: Stranger in the Night
2.description: Increases the Level of {LINK#S11205}<color=#FFD780FF>Ancient Ritual: Cometh the Night</color>{/LINK} by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Night on Bald Mountain
3.description: Flins's ATK is increased by 20%.\nAdditionally, his Ascension Talent {LINK#P1202201}<color=#FFD780FF>Whispering Flame</color>{/LINK} is enhanced: Flins's Elemental Mastery is increased by 10% of his ATK. The maximum increase obtainable this way is 220.

4.name: Exile's Shadow
4.description: Increases the Level of {LINK#S11202}<color=#FFD780FF>Ancient Rite: Arcane Light</color>{/LINK} by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Songs and Dances of Death
5.description: The DMG dealt to opponents by Flins's Lunar-Charged reactions is {LINK#N11190007}<color=#FFD780FF>elevated</color>{/LINK} by 35%.\n<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>: All nearby party members' Lunar-Charged DMG is <color=#FFD780FF>elevated</color> by 10%.

N11200001.name: Thunderous Symphony
N11200001.description: Consume less Elemental Energy to unleash a special Elemental Burst. Flins deals a single instance of <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color>. This DMG is considered Lunar-Charged DMG.\n<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>: If there are thunderclouds nearby, Flins will deal 1 additional instance of <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color>. This DMG is considered Lunar-Charged DMG.

N11190007.name: Elevation
N11190007.description: Special DMG Boost effect. It is calculated independently of other DMG Boost effects.

fetter.title: Yearning for Unseen Depths
fetter.detail: A reserved young man who is well-versed in diving. Beneath his distant, icy demeanor lies a pure heart bereft of all flaws.

costume.name: Icy Skin
costume.description: Freminet's outfit. This suit wraps around the deep diver like a second skin, his constant companion in countless sallies to the silent seabed.

nameCard.name: Freminet: Progress
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nAs the clockwork devices do naught but round and round in circles turn, the dolls march forward.

0.name: Flowing Eddies
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash. 

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Pressurized Floe
1.description: Performs an upward thrust that deals Cryo DMG and causes Freminet to enter Pers Timer for 10s. While Pers Timer is active, his Elemental Skill will turn into Shattering Pressure. Shattering Pressure Executes different sorts of attacks based on the Pressure Level of Pers Timer, and then cancels Pers Timer. ·Level 0: Unleashes a vertical cut, dealing Cryo DMG. ·Levels 1 to 3: Unleashes a vertical cut alongside Pers, dealing Cryo DMG and Physical DMG. DMG dealt scales based on Pressure Level. ·Level 4: Borrows the power of a fully-pressurized Pers to deal Physical DMG. Meanwhile, Normal Attack: Flowing Eddies will be replaced by Shattering Pressure. Pers Timer When Freminet uses Normal Attacks, he will also unleash waves of frost that deal Cryo DMG and increase Pers's Pressure Level. The accompanying Cryo DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG. Arkhe: Pneuma At certain intervals, after using the upward thrust, a Spiritbreath Thorn in the form of another upward thrust will be created, dealing Pneuma-aligned Cryo DMG. To immobilize one's opponent without taking their life can also be considered something of a "survival" strategy that one may choose. "Pers... I leave the rest to you."

description: Level 1 Shattering Pressure DMG|{param5:F1P} Cryo + {param6:F1P} Physical
Level 2 Shattering Pressure DMG|{param7:F1P} Cryo + {param8:F1P} Physical
Level 3 Shattering Pressure DMG|{param9:F1P} Cryo + {param10:F1P} Physical

Level 3 Shattering Pressure DMG|{param9:F1P} Cryo + {param10:F1P} Physical

3.name: Shadowhunter's Ambush
3.description: Unleashes a wave of untouchable cold, dealing AoE Cryo DMG, resetting the CD of the Elemental Skill "Pressurized Floe," and causing Freminet to enter the Subnautical Hunter mode for 10s. While in Subnautical Hunter mode, Freminet's resistance to interruption will increase, and his Elemental Skill "Pressurized Floe" will obtain the following buffs: ·CD is decreased by 70%. ·Normal Attacks will increase the Pers Timer by 1 additional Pressure Level, and the frost released by his Normal Attacks deal 200% of their original DMG. These effects will be canceled when Freminet leaves the field. "Now... I have no need of any extraneous noise."

4.name: Saturation Deep Dive
4.description: When Freminet unleashes <color=#FFD780FF>Pressurized Floe: Shattering Pressure</color>, if Pers Timer has yet to reach Pressure Level 4, the CD of Pressurized Floe will be decreased by 1s.

5.name: Parallel Condensers
5.description: When Freminet triggers Shatter against opponents, the DMG dealt by <color=#FFD780FF>Pressurized Floe: Shattering Pressure</color> will be increased by 40% for 5s.

6.name: Deepwater Navigation
6.description: Decreases Aquatic Stamina consumption for your own party members by 35%.\nNot stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

0.name: Dreams of the Foamy Deep
0.description: The CRIT Rate of <color=#FFD780FF>Pressurized Floe: Shattering Pressure</color> will be increased by 15%.

1.name: Penguins and the Land of Plenty
1.description: Unleashing <color=#FFD780FF>Pressurized Floe: Shattering Pressure</color> will restore 2 Energy to Freminet. If a Pressure Level 4 Shattering Pressure is unleashed, this will restore 3 Energy.

2.name: Song of the Eddies and Bleached Sands
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack: Flowing Eddies</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Dance of the Snowy Moon and Flute
3.description: After Freminet triggers Frozen, Shatter, or Superconduct against opponents, his ATK will be increased by 9% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. This can be triggered once every 0.3s.

4.name: Nights of Hearth and Happiness
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Pressurized Floe</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Moment of Waking and Resolve
5.description: After Freminet triggers Frozen, Shatter, or Superconduct against opponents, his CRIT DMG will be increased by 12% for 6s. Max 3 stacks. This can be triggered once every 0.3s.

fetter.title: Endless Solo of Solitude
fetter.detail: The absolute focus of the stage of judgment, until the final applause sounds.

costume.name: Coronated Prima Donna
costume.description: Furina's outfit. When the curtain rises, the star of the show is meant to shine bright on the stage, and even gorgeous costumes adorned with diamonds pale in comparison to her own dazzling brilliance.

nameCard.name: Furina: Banquet
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nCan one person eat every cake? If they eat one per day, they should be able to enjoy cake for a week or so, right? But will the cakes stay fresh that long? Hmm... Well, don't worry, because there will be friends coming to eat the cakes together.

0.name: Soloist's Solicitation
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a solo dance, dealing Physical DMG to nearby opponents and changing her Arkhe alignment. If Salon Members or the Singer of Many Waters summoned by her Elemental Skill "Salon Solitaire" is present, their lineup will switch in response.

<color=#FFD780FF>Arkhe: Seats Sacred and Secular</color>
At intervals, when Furina's Normal Attacks hit, a Spiritbreath Thorn or a Surging Blade will descend based on her current Arkhe alignment, dealing Pneuma- or Ousia-aligned <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>.
When Furina takes the field, her starting Arkhe alignment will be Ousia.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Salon Solitaire
1.description: Invites the guests of the Salon Solitaire to come forth and aid in Furina's performance. Will summon either the Salon Members or the Singer of Many Waters based on Furina's current Arkhe alignment. Ousia Foaming bubbles like celebrants shall dance, dealing AoE Hydro DMG based on Furina's Max HP and summoning 3 Salon Members: the Ball Octopus-shaped Gentilhomme Usher, the Bubbly Seahorse-shaped Surintendante Chevalmarin, and the Armored Crab-shaped Mademoiselle Crabaletta. They will attack nearby opponents at intervals, prioritizing the target of the active character, dealing Hydro DMG based on Max HP. When they attack, if character(s) with more than 50% HP are nearby, the Members will increase their current attack's power based on the number of such characters, and consume said characters' HP. If 1/2/3/4 (or more) characters meet these requirements, the Members' attacks will deal 110%/120%/130%/140% of their original DMG. Pneuma Summons the Singer of Many Waters, who will heal nearby active character(s) based on Max HP at intervals. The Salon Members and Singer of Many Waters share a duration, and when Furina uses her Charged Attack to change the guest type, the new guests will inherit the remaining duration. While the Salon Members or the Singer of Many Waters is on the field, Furina can move on the water's surface. A fixed roster of regulars frequent Furina's Salon Solitaire. At other times, Mademoiselle Crabaletta, Surintendante Chevalmarin, and Gentilhomme Usher shall visit, and on gloomy Wednesdays, it is the singer who comes by.

3.name: Let the People Rejoice
3.description: Rouses the impulse to revel, creating a stage of foam that will deal AoE Hydro DMG based on Furina's Max HP and cause nearby party members to enter the Universal Revelry state: During this time, when nearby party members' HP increases or decreases, 1 Fanfare point will be granted to Furina for each percentage point of their Max HP by which their HP changes. At the same time, Furina will increase the DMG dealt by and Incoming Healing Bonus of all nearby party members based on the amount of Fanfare she has. When the duration ends, Furina's Fanfare points will be cleared. "Cheer! Give praise! Be awed! Raise your glasses! Every night bereft of banqueting is a sordid squandering of sore, sober daylight... And, uh, those who are not yet of age may have grape juice instead!"
