Purrsonal Coordinated Assistance Robot Healing|{param4:F1P} ATK+{param5:I}
Lowest HP Character Additional Healing|{param6:F1P} ATK+{param7:I}

4.name: Plan to Get Paid
4.description:
When your team has at least one <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>, <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>, <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>, or <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> character, the {LINK#N11240002}<color=#FFD780FF>Purrsonal Coordinated Assistance Robots</color>{/LINK} from the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Hidden Aces: Seven Tools of the Hunter</color> will be enhanced based on the number of characters of each corresponding element.
Jahoda secretly keeps track of these characters. Among them, the element with the highest number of characters determines the enhancement effect:
· <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>: <color=#FFD780FF>Purrsonal Coordinated Assistance Robots</color> deal 130% of their original DMG.
· <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>: <color=#FFD780FF>Purrsonal Coordinated Assistance Robots</color> heal for 120% of their original healing amount.
· <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>: The number of <color=#FFD780FF>Purrsonal Coordinated Assistance Robots</color> increases by one.
· <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>: The attack interval of <color=#FFD780FF>Purrsonal Coordinated Assistance Robots</color> is reduced by 10%.

If there's a tie between elements, the order of priority that determines which enhancement takes effect is: <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>, <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>, <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>, then <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>. Only one elemental effect can initially be triggered.

5.name: Sweet Berry Bounty
5.description: When a {LINK#N11240002}<color=#FFD780FF>Purrsonal Coordinated Assistance Robot</color>{/LINK} from the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Hidden Aces: Seven Tools of the Hunter</color> triggers healing on an active team member, if that character's HP is above 70%, their Elemental Mastery will be increased by 100 for 6s.

6.name: Moonsign Benediction: Rooftop Dash
6.description: When Jahoda is in the party, the party's <color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign</color> will increase by 1 level.

8.name: Backstreet Guile
8.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Nod-Krai, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

0.name: One More Flask!
0.description: When a <color=#FFD780FF>Fluffy Meowball</color> fired by the {LINK#N11240001}<color=#FFD780FF>Purr-loined Treasure Flask</color>{/LINK} from the Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Savvy Strategy: Splitting the Spoils</color> hits an enemy, there is a 50% chance for it to bounce, dealing the corresponding Elemental DMG to nearby opponents.

1.name: Rogue's Quick Thinking
1.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>: In the Ascension Talent {LINK#P1242101}<color=#FFD780FF>"Plan to Get Paid,"</color>{/LINK} Jahoda can secretly track, in addition to the element with the highest number of characters, the element with the next highest number of characters among the remaining types. This allows up to two elemental effects to be active at once. You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Plan to Get Paid."

2.name: Desperate Gamble
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11245}Hidden Aces: Seven Tools of the Hunter{/LINK}</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Wild Berry Amid the Dust
3.description: When a {LINK#N11240002}<color=#FFD780FF>Purrsonal Coordinated Assistance Robot</color>{/LINK} from the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Hidden Aces: Seven Tools of the Hunter</color> undergoes an Elemental Conversion, Jahoda will recover 4 Elemental Energy.

4.name: The Greatest Treasure
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11242}Savvy Strategy: Splitting the Spoils{/LINK}</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: The Littlest Luck
5.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>: After the {LINK#N11240001}<color=#FFD780FF>Purr-loined Treasure Flask</color>{/LINK} from the Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Savvy Strategy: Splitting the Spoils</color> is full, nearby Moonsign characters in your party have their CRIT Rate increased by 5% and CRIT DMG increased by 40% for 20s.

N11240001.name: Purr-loined Treasure Flask
N11240001.description:
A small elemental vessel that Jahoda retrieves after casting her Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Savvy Strategy: Splitting the Spoils</color>.
While Jahoda is in the Shadow Pursuit state, if nearby opponents are affected by <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>, <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>, <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>, or <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>, the Purr-loined Treasure Flask will convert to that element and begin filling up. The order of priority that determines which element will be converted to is: <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>, <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>, <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>, then <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>. After each use of her Elemental Skill, the Purr-loined Treasure Flask can undergo one such conversion.
When the Purr-loined Treasure Flask is full, Jahoda immediately drains it, exiting the Shadow Pursuit state and dealing a single instance of <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color> to nearby opponents.
Each time the Elemental Skill is cast, Jahoda takes out a brand-new Purr-loined Treasure Flask.

<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>: When the <color=#FFD780FF>Purr-loined Treasure Flask</color> becomes full, Jahoda will not immediately discharge it. Instead, for a short duration, she steadily consumes the stored element inside and periodically fires <color=#FFD780FF>Fluffy Meowballs</color> at nearby opponents, dealing DMG of the corresponding element stored in the <color=#FFD780FF>Purr-loined Treasure Flask</color>.

N11240002.name: Purrsonal Coordinated Assistance Robots
N11240002.description:
One of the gadgets that Jahoda — a former treasure hunter — carries around with her. It is deployed upon using her Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Hidden Aces: Seven Tools of the Hunter</color>.
Purrsonal Coordinated Assistance Robots continuously restore HP to your active character. If the healed character's HP is above 70%, they also restore HP to the nearby party member with the lowest HP.

<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>: If nearby opponents are affected by <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>, <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>, <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>, or <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>, Purrsonal Coordinated Assistance Robots will convert to that element. The order of priority that determines which element will be converted to is: <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>, <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>, <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>, then <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>. After each deployment, a Purrsonal Coordinated Assistance Robot can undergo one such conversion. After converting, the Purrsonal Coordinated Assistance Robot will periodically attack up to 3 nearby opponents, dealing damage of the corresponding element.

fetter.title: Dandelion Knight
fetter.detail: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.

costume.name: Favonian Devotion
costume.description: Jean's outfit. Neat and smart clothing that emphasizes her chivalry.

costume.name: Sea Breeze Dandelion
costume.description: Jean's summer wear. Light and cool, but no less elegant for it. The perfect choice for a trip to the seaside.

costume.name: Gunnhildr's Legacy
costume.description: Jean's outfit. This classic knight's ceremonial outfit is suited to all manner of occasions.

nameCard.name: Jean: The Winds' Course
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nThe dandelion, also called "lion's fang" by some, is the flower most sensitive to the direction of the wind.

0.name: Favonius Bladework
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of stamina to launch an opponent using the power of wind.
Launched opponents will slowly fall to the ground.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Gale Blade
1.description: Focusing the might of the formless wind around her blade, Jean releases a miniature storm, launching opponents in the direction she aims at, dealing massive Anemo DMG. Hold At the cost of continued stamina consumption, Jean can command the whirlwind to pull surrounding opponents and objects towards her front. Direction can be adjusted. Character is immobile during skill duration. That which follows Jean, the wholehearted defender, is a guardian wind that can banish danger from her comrades' presence.

3.name: Dandelion Breeze
3.description: Calling upon the wind's protection, Jean creates a swirling Dandelion Field, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Anemo DMG. At the same time, she instantly regenerates a large amount of HP for all party members. The amount of HP restored scales off Jean's ATK. Dandelion Field ·Continuously regenerates HP of characters within the AoE and continuously imbues them with Anemo. ·Deals Anemo DMG to opponents entering or exiting the Dandelion Field. Jean's magnanimity is as vast as the dandelion fields, and it is the root of her wish to protect others.

4.name: Wind Companion
4.description: On hit, Jean's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance to regenerate HP equal to 15% of Jean's ATK for all party members.

5.name: Let the Wind Lead
5.description: Using <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color> will regenerate 20% of its Energy.

6.name: Guiding Breeze
6.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

0.name: Spiraling Tempest
0.description: Increases the pulling speed of <color=#FFD780FF>Gale Blade</color> after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

1.name: People's Aegis
1.description: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

2.name: When the West Wind Arises
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Lands of Dandelion
3.description: Within the Field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color>, all opponents have their <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 40%.

4.name: Outbursting Gust
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Gale Blade</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
5.description: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color>. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

fetter.title: Mottled Gold Yet Unsmelted
fetter.detail: A young warrior of the Nanatzcayan, given the Ancient Name of "Uthabiti." Kind-hearted and insatiably persistent, she grows stronger and more capable with each setback she faces.

costume.name: Tawny Peaks, Spired Rock
costume.description: Kachina's outfit. Sturdy gloves, check, wear-resistant boots, check — "Uthabiti" Kachina is ready to face the challenges ahead!

nameCard.name: Kachina: Twirly
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nThe upper half of the Turbo Twirly is very stable, but if the lower half gets stuck, there's a high chance you'll end up with one very dizzy rider.

0.name: Cragbiter
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Go, Go Turbo Twirly!
1.description: Fight alongside the turbo trusty Turbo Twirly! Summons Turbo Twirly. When the skill is Held and released, Kachina will summon and ride Turbo Twirly. After the Skill is used, Kachina will gain 60 Nightsoul points and enter the Nightsoul's Blessing state. Nightsoul's Blessing: Kachina Turbo Twirly's various actions consume Kachina's Nightsoul points. The Nightsoul's Blessing state will end when these points have been depleted. Turbo Twirly Can exist independently or be ridden and operated by Kachina. When Turbo Twirly is present, Kachina's Elemental Skill, "Go, Go Turbo Twirly!", will change to an option to Mount/Dismount Turbo Twirly. ·When present independent of Kachina, it will slam the ground at intervals, dealing Nightsoul-aligned AoE Geo DMG based on Kachina's DEF. ·When Kachina is riding Turbo Twirly, she can control it to move and climb swiftly, and use Normal Attacks to slam the ground, dealing Nightsoul-aligned AoE Geo DMG based on Kachina's DEF. Turbo Twirly will disappear once Kachina's Nightsoul's Blessing state ends, and it is considered a Geo Construct. Only 1 Turbo Twirly created by Kachina herself can exist on the field at any one time. Turbo Twirly only looks like a top — it is, in fact, a drill that can split even the strongest rock asunder!

3.name: Time to Get Serious!
3.description: Striking the ground, Kachina deals AoE Geo DMG based on her DEF and creates a Turbo Drill Field. The Field increases Turbo Twirly's attack AoE and its Movement SPD when Kachina is riding it. If Kachina's own Turbo Twirly is present when this is used, the Turbo Twirly will be summoned to her side. Just as nervous performers might imagine audience members as wooden puppets, Kachina imagines that her opponents are the loveliest of gem-bearing ores — the kind you'd be proud to bring home and hoard.

4.name: Mountain Echoes
4.description: After nearby party members trigger a Nightsoul Burst, Kachina's <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG Bonus</color> increases by 20% for 12s.

5.name: The Weight of Stone
5.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Turbo Twirly</color>'s DMG is increased by 20% of Kachina's DEF.

6.name: Night Realm's Gift: Heart of Unity
6.description:
After her Nightsoul points are depleted, Kachina will switch to consuming Phlogiston to maintain her Nightsoul's Blessing.
While in an area with Phlogiston Mechanics within Natlan, she can use Nightsoul Transmission: Kachina. When the active character is currently sprinting, climbing, in a movement mode caused by certain Talents, or at a certain height in the air, the following will trigger when switching to Kachina: Kachina will enter the Nightsoul's Blessing state and ride <color=#FFD780FF>Turbo Twirly</color> when taking the field while gaining 30 Nightsoul points. Nightsoul Transmission can be triggered once every 10s by your own team.

Additionally, while in Natlan, Kachina will consume 90% less Stamina when climbing while riding <color=#FFD780FF>Turbo Twirly</color>.

8.name: Boon of Crystal Flame
8.description: While in an area with Phlogiston Mechanics within Natlan, 20 Stamina will be restored when interacting with some harvestable items. Additionally, the location of nearby <color=#FFD780FF>resources unique to Natlan</color> will appear on your mini-map.

0.name: Shards Are Gems Too
0.description: When Kachina mounts or dismounts <color=#FFD780FF>Turbo Twirly</color>, she will absorb nearby Elemental Shards created by Crystallize.\nAdditionally, when a party member picks up such a Shard, or triggers Lunar-Crystallize reactions, 3 Energy will be restored to Kachina. Energy can be restored this way once every 5s.

1.name: Never Leave Home Without... Turbo Twirly
1.description: When Kachina uses <color=#FFD780FF>"Time to Get Serious!"</color>, she will regain 20 Nightsoul points. If there is no <color=#FFD780FF>Turbo Twirly</color> belonging to her on the field, she will enter Nightsoul's Blessing and summon one.

2.name: Improved Stabilizer
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Go, Go Turbo Twirly!</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: More Foes, More Caution
3.description: When there are 1/2/3/4 (or more) opponents within the Turbo Drill Field created by <color=#FFD780FF>"Time to Get Serious!"</color>, the active character within the field gains 8%/12%/16%/20% increased DEF.

4.name: All I've Collected Till Now
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Time to Get Serious!</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: This Time, I've Gotta Win
5.description: When your active character's Shield is replaced or destroyed for any reason, Kachina will deal 200% of her DEF as <color=#FFE699FF>AoE Geo DMG</color>. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.

fetter.title: Scarlet Leaves Pursue Wild Waves
fetter.detail: A wandering samurai from Inazuma who is currently with Liyue's Crux Fleet. A gentle and carefree soul whose heart hides a great many burdens from the past.

costume.name: Falling Leaves
costume.description: Kaedehara Kazuha's outfit. The maple leaf patterns are the hallmark of this wandering samurai's clothes.

nameCard.name: Kaedehara Kazuha: Autumn Maple-Viewing
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\n"The pine-song ripples as red leaves billow."

0.name: Garyuu Bladework
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact. If this Plunging Attack is triggered by Chihayaburu, it will be converted to Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan</color>
When a Plunging Attack is performed using the effects of the Elemental Skill Chihayaburu, Plunging Attack DMG is converted to <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color> and will create a small wind tunnel via a secret blade technique that pulls in nearby objects and opponents.

1.name: Chihayaburu
1.description: #Unleashes a secret technique as fierce as the rushing wind that pulls objects and opponents towards Kazuha's current position before launching opponents within the AoE, dealing Anemo DMG and lifting Kazuha into the air on a rushing gust of wind. Within 10s of remaining airborne after casting Chihayaburu, Kazuha can unleash a powerful Plunging Attack known as Midare Ranzan. {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Can be used in mid-air. Hold Charges up before unleashing greater Anemo DMG over a larger AoE than {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Mode. Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan When a Plunging Attack is performed using the effects of the Elemental Skill Chihayaburu, Plunging Attack DMG is converted to Anemo DMG. On landing, Kazuha creates a small wind tunnel via a secret blade technique that pulls in nearby objects and opponents. Midare Ranzan's DMG is considered Plunging Attack DMG. "Wind in branches grieves Bygone ages, gods of old Withered autumn leaves"

3.name: Kazuha Slash
3.description: The signature technique of Kazuha's self-styled bladework — a single slash that strikes with the force of the first winds of autumn, dealing AoE Anemo DMG. The blade's passage will leave behind a field named "Autumn Whirlwind" that periodically deals AoE Anemo DMG to opponents within its range. Elemental Absorption If Autumn Whirlwind comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use. "I see eternity go by in an instant, the autumns of many years from a single leaf. Thus I shall slice this maple in a flash, and ask a question of the ages."

4.name: Soumon Swordsmanship
4.description: If <color=#FFD780FF>Chihayaburu</color> comes into contact with <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>/<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>/<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>/<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> when cast, this <color=#FFD780FF>Chihayaburu</color> will absorb that element and if Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan is used before the effect expires, it will deal an additional 200% ATK of the absorbed elemental type as DMG. This will be considered Plunging Attack DMG.\nElemental Absorption may only occur once per use of <color=#FFD780FF>Chihayaburu</color>.

5.name: Poetics of Fuubutsu
5.description: Upon triggering a Swirl reaction, Kaedehara Kazuha will grant all party members a 0.04% Elemental DMG Bonus to the element absorbed by Swirl for every point of Elemental Mastery he has for 8s. Bonuses for different elements obtained through this method can co-exist.

6.name: Cloud Strider
6.description: Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.\nNot stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

0.name: Scarlet Hills
0.description: Decreases <color=#FFD780FF>Chihayaburu</color>'s CD by 10%.\nUsing <color=#FFD780FF>Kazuha Slash</color> resets the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Chihayaburu</color>.

1.name: Yamaarashi Tailwind
1.description:
The Autumn Whirlwind field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Kazuha Slash</color> has the following effects:
· Increases Kaedehara Kazuha's own Elemental Mastery by 200 for its duration.
· Increases the Elemental Mastery of characters within the field by 200.

The Elemental Mastery-increasing effects of this Constellation do not stack.

2.name: Maple Monogatari
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Chihayaburu</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Oozora Genpou
3.description: #When Kaedehara Kazuha's Energy is lower than 45, he obtains the following effects:\n·{LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tapping}{LAYOUT_PC#Pressing}{LAYOUT_PS#Pressing} or Holding <color=#FFD780FF>Chihayaburu</color> regenerates 3 or 4 Energy for Kaedehara Kazuha, respectively.\n·When gliding, Kaedehara Kazuha regenerates 2 Energy per second.

4.name: Wisdom of Bansei
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Kazuha Slash</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Crimson Momiji
5.description: After using <color=#FFD780FF>Chihayaburu</color> or <color=#FFD780FF>Kazuha Slash</color>, Kaedehara Kazuha gains an <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo Infusion</color> for 5s. Additionally, each point of Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Kaedehara Kazuha's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks by 0.2%.

fetter.title: Frostwind Swordsman
fetter.detail: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

costume.name: Icy Featherflight
costume.description: Kaeya's outfit. Fashionable clothes festooned with a fur collar.

costume.name: Sailwind Shadow
costume.description: Kaeya's outfit from his role as the "Dagger Bandit" in the play. Though flamboyant and designed to be as eye-catching as possible, it isn't difficult to put on, though it does take some time to get all the accessories and daggers sorted.

nameCard.name: Kaeya: Pavo Ocellus
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nThe pattern of peacock feathers resembles eyes that never shut. Can we really say that this Pavo Ocellus is missing an eye...?

0.name: Ceremonial Bladework
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Frostgnaw
1.description: Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in front of Kaeya.\n\nKaeya seems affable, but his nature is that of unyielding ice.

3.name: Glacial Waltz
3.description: Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him. These icicles will follow the character around and deal Cryo DMG to opponents in their path for the ability's duration. A winsome smile, genial words, and the merciless hoarfrost that lies beneath... These are all Kaeya's weapons.

4.name: Cold-Blooded Strike
4.description: Every hit with <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of his ATK.

5.name: Glacial Heart
5.description: Opponents <color=#99FFFFFF>Frozen</color> by <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> will drop additional Elemental Particles.\nFrostgnaw may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.

6.name: Hidden Strength
6.description: Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.\nNot stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

0.name: Excellent Blood
0.description: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> is increased by 15%.

1.name: Never-Ending Performance
1.description: While <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> is in effect, for each opponent defeated, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

2.name: Dance of Frost
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Frozen Kiss
3.description:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

4.name: Frostbiting Embrace
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Glacial Whirlwind
5.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

fetter.title: Frostflake Heron
fetter.detail: Daughter of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Dignified and elegant, as well as wise and strong.

costume.name: Flawless Radiance
costume.description: Kamisato Ayaka's outfit. This kimono features an armor-coated skirt, displaying the nobility and resilience of the Shirasagi Himegimi.

costume.name: Springbloom Missive
costume.description: Ayaka's travel outfit. Its design is based on the Fontaine dresses depicted in light novel illustrations and seems to serve as a window into the lifestyle of proper ladies who live in that nation.

nameCard.name: Kamisato Ayaka: Folding Fan
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nAyaka does constantly change out the fans she carries with her, of course. If you're buying her some as gifts, remember not to send summer fans or throwing fans. Dancing fans or tea fans are good choices, though.

0.name: Kamisato Art: Kabuki
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a flurry of sword ki.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Kamisato Art: Hyouka
1.description: Summons blooming ice to launch nearby opponents, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.\n\n"Clouds shroud the moonlit night. Longing descends like a fog, filling the one detained with wanderlust."

2.name: Kamisato Art: Senho
2.description: Alternate Sprint Ayaka consumes Stamina and cloaks herself in a frozen fog that moves with her. In Senho form, she moves swiftly upon water. When she reappears, the following effects occur: ·Ayaka unleashes frigid energy to apply Cryo on nearby opponents. ·Coldness condenses around Ayaka's blade, infusing her attacks with Cryo for a brief period. "Feathers fleeting wet / the white heron treads water / a sight without flaw"

4.name: Kamisato Art: Soumetsu
4.description: Summons forth a snowstorm with flawless poise, unleashing a Frostflake Seki no To that moves forward continuously. Frostflake Seki no To ·A storm of whirling icy winds that slashes repeatedly at every enemy it touches, dealing Cryo DMG. ·The snowstorm explodes after its duration ends, dealing AoE Cryo DMG. "The blizzard veils the heron's thoughts, pity heavy in its heart."

5.name: Amatsumi Kunitsumi Sanctification
5.description: After using <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Hyouka</color>, Kamisato Ayaka's Normal and Charged Attacks deal 30% increased DMG for 6s.

6.name: Kanten Senmyou Blessing
6.description: When the Cryo application at the end of <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Senho</color> hits an opponent, Kamisato Ayaka gains the following effects:\n·Restores 10 Stamina\n·Gains 18% <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

7.name: Fruits of Shinsa
7.description: When Ayaka crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

0.name: Snowswept Sakura
0.description: When Kamisato Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Hyouka</color> by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.

1.name: Blizzard Blade Seki no To
1.description: When casting <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Soumetsu</color>, unleashes 2 smaller additional Frostflake Seki no To, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.

2.name: Frostbloom Kamifubuki
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Soumetsu</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Ebb and Flow
3.description: Opponents damaged by <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Soumetsu</color>'s Frostflake Seki no To will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.

4.name: Blossom Cloud Irutsuki
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Hyouka</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Dance of Suigetsu
5.description: Kamisato Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her Charged Attack DMG by 298%. This buff will be cleared 0.5s after Ayaka's Charged ATK hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.

fetter.title: Pillar of Fortitude
fetter.detail: The young but highly accomplished head of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Cultured and polite, he is a man of many ways and means.

costume.name: Silk Splendor
costume.description: Kamisato Ayato's outfit. The kimono itself is made using uncommon fabrics, and its patterning recalls a mountain spring, giving off a feeling of calm and stability that matches its wearer.

nameCard.name: Kamisato Ayato: Ripple
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nThe camellia alights upon the mirrored pond, sending ripples throughout the water.

0.name: Kamisato Art: Marobashi
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to dash forward and performs an iai.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Kamisato Art: Kyouka
1.description: Kamisato Ayato shifts positions and enters the Takimeguri Kanka state. After this shift, he will leave a watery illusion at his original location. After it is formed, the watery illusion will explode if opponents are nearby or after its duration ends, dealing AoE Hydro DMG. Takimeguri Kanka In this state, Kamisato Ayato uses his Shunsuiken to engage in blindingly fast attacks, causing DMG from his Normal Attacks to be converted into AoE Hydro DMG. This cannot be overridden. It also has the following properties: ·After a Shunsuiken attack hits an opponent, it will grant Ayato the Namisen effect, increasing the DMG dealt by Shunsuiken based on Ayato's current Max HP. The initial maximum number of Namisen stacks is 4, and 1 stack can be gained through Shunsuiken every 0.1s. This effect will be dispelled when Takimeguri Kanka ends. ·Kamisato Ayato's resistance to interruption is increased. ·Unable to use Charged or Plunging Attacks. Takimeguri Kanka will be cleared when Ayato leaves the field. Using Kamisato Art: Kyouka again while in the Takimeguri Kanka state will reset and replace the pre-existing state. "When, I wonder, did you come under the illusion that you were winning?" — Ayato is like this in both matter of martial prowess and political intrigue, but to preserve the dignity of his fellow Commissioners, he does not say such things to them. As such, only Thoma, Itto, and Ayaka have ever heard this line.

3.name: Kamisato Art: Suiyuu
3.description: Unveils a garden of purity that silences the cacophony within. While this space exists, Bloomwater Blades will constantly rain down and attack opponents within its AoE, dealing Hydro DMG and increasing the Normal Attack DMG of characters within. "I can see them, you know. The ripples of your beating heart within this realm of still waters."

4.name: Kamisato Art: Mine Wo Matoishi Kiyotaki
4.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Kyouka</color> has the following properties:\n·After it is used, Kamisato Ayato will gain 2 Namisen stacks.\n·When the water illusion explodes, Ayato will gain a Namisen effect equal to the maximum number of stacks possible.

5.name: Kamisato Art: Michiyuku Hagetsu
5.description: If Kamisato Ayato is not on the field and his Energy is less than 40, he will regenerate 2 Energy for himself every second.

6.name: Kamisato Art: Daily Cooking
6.description: When Ayato cooks a dish perfectly, he has an 18% chance to receive an additional "Suspicious" dish of the same type.

0.name: Kyouka Fuushi
0.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Shunsuiken</color> DMG is increased by 40% against opponents with 50% HP or less.

1.name: World Source
1.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Namisen</color>'s maximum stack count is increased to 5. When Kamisato Ayato has at least 3 Namisen stacks, his Max HP is increased by 50%.

2.name: To Admire the Flowers
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Kyouka</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Endless Flow
3.description: After using <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Suiyuu</color>, all nearby party members will have 15% increased Normal Attack SPD for 15s.

4.name: Bansui Ichiro
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Suiyuu</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Boundless Origin
5.description: After using <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Kyouka</color>, Ayato's next Shunsuiken attack will create 2 extra Shunsuiken strikes when they hit opponents, each one dealing 450% of Ayato's ATK as DMG.\nBoth these Shunsuiken attacks will not be affected by Namisen.

fetter.title: Empyrean Reflection
fetter.detail: A renowned architect from Sumeru who perhaps cares a bit too much about too many things. He is an aesthete troubled by reality.

costume.name: Gold Pinions in Flames Bathed
costume.description: Kaveh's outfit. A notable tailor from Treasures Street created these clothes in imitation of the lovely sight of birds extending their wings in flight and would only sell them to those who knew how to appreciate their beauty.

nameCard.name: Kaveh: Domed Court
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\n"When conceptualizing architecture, there is nothing wrong with imagining that the structure we build will surmount the firmament and outlast the stars."

0.name: Schematic Setup
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Uses Mehrak to perform up to 4 consecutive attacks.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Artistic Ingenuity
1.description: Uses Mehrak's mapping ability for offensive purposes, initiating a radial scan that deals AoE Dendro DMG. It will also scan all Dendro Cores in its AoE and cause them to immediately burst.\n\nMehrak was created through the modification of ancient technology and may have some other functions apart from mapping work...

3.name: Painted Dome
3.description: Completely unleashes Mehrak's energy and creates a cubic scanned space, dealing AoE Dendro DMG to all opponents within it, causing all Dendro Cores in its AoE to immediately burst, and granting Kaveh the following enhanced combat abilities for a specific duration: · Increases Kaveh's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack AoE, and converts his attack DMG to Dendro DMG that cannot be overridden. · All Dendro Cores created by all your own party members through Bloom and Lunar-Bloom reactions will deal additional DMG when they burst. · Increases Kaveh's resistance to interruption. These effects will be canceled once Kaveh leaves the field. "Every building style includes the architect's unique worldview, and from this angle, one can say that the buildings themselves are coalescences of human memories."

4.name: An Architect's Undertaking
4.description: When DMG dealt by a Dendro Core (including DMG from Burgeon and Hyperbloom) hits Kaveh, Kaveh will regain HP equal to 300% of his Elemental Mastery. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s.

5.name: A Craftsman's Curious Conceptions
5.description: During <color=#FFD780FF>Painted Dome</color>, after Kaveh's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks hit opponents, his Elemental Mastery will increase by 25. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 4 stacks.\nThis effect will be canceled when Painted Dome's effects end.

6.name: The Art of Budgeting
6.description: When Kaveh crafts Landscape, Building, and Courtyard-type Furnishings, he has a 100% chance to refund a portion of the materials used.

0.name: Sublime Salutations
0.description: Within 3s after using <color=#FFD780FF>Artistic Ingenuity</color>, Kaveh's <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro RES</color> and Incoming Healing Bonus will be increased by 50% and 25% respectively.

1.name: Grace of Royal Roads
1.description: Kaveh's Normal Attack SPD increases by 15% during <color=#FFD780FF>Painted Dome</color>.

2.name: Profferings of Dur Untash
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Painted Dome</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Feast of Apadana
3.description: Dendro Cores created from Bloom and Lunar-Bloom reactions Kaveh triggers will deal 60% more DMG when they burst.

4.name: Treasures of Bonkhanak
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Artistic Ingenuity</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Pairidaeza's Dreams
5.description: When Kaveh's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks hit opponents during <color=#FFD780FF>Painted Dome</color>, they will unleash Pairidaeza's Light upon the opponent's position, dealing 61.8% of Kaveh's ATK as <color=#99FF88FF>AoE Dendro DMG</color> and causing all Dendro Cores within that AoE to burst. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

fetter.title: Driving Thunder
fetter.detail: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis's unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

costume.name: Piercing Thunderbolt
costume.description: Keqing's outfit. A formidable-looking dress made using luxurious materials.

costume.name: Opulent Splendor
costume.description: Keqing's formal wear. Amidst the beautiful dawn of the Lantern Rite, the threads weaved by days of hard work intertwine into a light yet magnificent appearance.

nameCard.name: Keqing: Lightning Stiletto
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nIt was originally invented to just test out one's surroundings and climb to high places, really...

0.name: Yunlai Swordsmanship
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Stellar Restoration
1.description: Hurls a Lightning Stiletto that annihilates her opponents like the swift thunder. When the Stiletto hits its target, it deals Electro DMG to opponents in a small AoE, and places a Stiletto Mark on the spot hit. Hold Hold to adjust the direction in which the Stiletto shall be thrown. Stilettos thrown by the Hold attack mode can be suspended in mid-air, allowing Keqing to jump to them when using Stellar Restoration a second time. Lightning Stiletto If Keqing uses Stellar Restoration again or uses a Charged Attack while its duration lasts, it will clear the Stiletto Mark and produce different effects: ·If she uses Stellar Restoration again, she will blink to the location of the Mark and unleash one slashing attack that deals AoE Electro DMG. When blinking to a Stiletto that was thrown from a Holding attack, Keqing can leap across obstructing terrain. ·If Keqing uses a Charged Attack, she will ignite a series of thundering cuts at the Mark's location, dealing AoE Electro DMG. "Humans are like moths, endlessly chasing the flame we call gods and adepti. But this light that I have here is my own."

3.name: Starward Sword
3.description: Keqing unleashes the power of lightning, dealing Electro DMG in an AOE. She then blends into the shadow of her blade, striking a series of thunderclap-blows to nearby opponents simultaneously that deal multiple instances of Electro DMG. The final attack deals massive AoE Electro DMG. The swiftest technique in Keqing's personal arsenal is fast enough to bring stars crashing down.

4.name: Thundering Penance
4.description: After recasting <color=#FFD780FF>Stellar Restoration</color> while a Lightning Stiletto is present, Keqing's weapon gains an <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro Infusion</color> for 5s.

5.name: Aristocratic Dignity
5.description: When casting <color=#FFD780FF>Starward Sword</color>, Keqing's CRIT Rate is increased by 15%, and her Energy Recharge is increased by 15%. This effect lasts for 8s.

6.name: Land's Overseer
6.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

0.name: Thundering Might
0.description: Recasting <color=#FFD780FF>Stellar Restoration</color> while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>AoE Electro DMG</color> at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

1.name: Keen Extraction
1.description: When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents affected by <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle.\nThis effect can only occur once every 5s.

2.name: Foreseen Reformation
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Starward Sword</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Attunement
3.description: For 10s after Keqing triggers an <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro-related Elemental Reaction</color>, her ATK is increased by 25%.

4.name: Beckoning Stars
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Stellar Restoration</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Tenacious Star
5.description: When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG Bonus</color> for 8s.\nEffects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.

fetter.title: Turnfire Hunt
fetter.detail: A Huitztlan Saurian Hunter skilled at counting costs.

cv.JP: 杉山紀彰 & 竹内順子

costume.name: Eight-Bit Artistry
costume.description: Kinich's outfit. Colorful patches are arrayed across his clothes with great patterned precision, just as Saurian Hunters have their own principles.

nameCard.name: Kinich: Ajaw
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nAt first glance, you might think that the Almighty Dragonlord, K'uhul Ajaw had finally succeeded in turning the puny Kinich into a vessel of his will. Sadly, though, this is just the way namecards are named.

0.name: Nightsun Style
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 3 rapid strikes.
After using his Elemental Skill "Canopy Hunter: Riding High"'s mid-air swing, he can perform a Normal Attack in mid-air before landing.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to spin and throw his Claymore forward to attack opponents.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Canopy Hunter: Riding High
1.description: Kinich uses his big-game hunting skills to either move swiftly or attack his opponent. When there is an opponent or object that can be attacked nearby, he will attach a grappling hook to the target and enter Nightsoul's Blessing with 0 Nightsoul points. If neither is nearby, he fires a grappling hook forward and swings in mid-air, and this Skill's CD is decreased by 60%. This skill can be Held to release. When it is Held, Kinich can aim the grappling hook. Nightsoul's Blessing: Kinich Kinich's Nightsoul's Blessing lasts 10s and generates 2 Nightsoul points every second. In this state, Kinich will hook onto a nearby opponent and perform a variable attack: ·When using a Normal Attack, Kinich will fire Loop Shots as he loops around the grappled target based on his current movement direction, dealing Nightsoul-aligned Dendro DMG and generating 3 Nightsoul points. Loop Shot DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG. ·When Nightsoul points are at max, he can use the Elemental Skill "Scalespiker Cannon": Consume all Nightsoul points to deal Nightsoul-aligned Dendro DMG. When "Scalespiker Cannon" is Held, Kinich can aim this shot. After firing the Cannon, Kinich will try to grapple to its target. While in Nightsoul's Blessing, after grappling an opponent or firing "Scalespiker Cannon," a Blind Spot will be generated next to the opponent. When Kinich enters this Blind Spot, it will disappear and he will generate 4 Nightsoul points. If the grapple connection should snap due to exceeding the maximum distance or some other reason, using a Normal Attack will establish a new connection with a nearby opponent before performing Loop Shots. "All things come with a cost. I suggest you make a suitable offer... What? No, I don't do installments."

3.name: Hail to the Almighty Dragonlord
3.description: Unleashes the power of the Almighty Dragonlord, K'uhul Ajaw (on a limited, conditional, restricted, contractual, partial, temporary basis), dealing Nightsoul-aligned AoE Dendro DMG. Ajaw will unleash his Dragon Breath at intervals, dealing Nightsoul-aligned AoE Dendro DMG. If Kinich is in Nightsoul's Blessing when this is used, this Blessing's duration is extended by 1.7s. "Yes, yes! You stand before K'uhul Ajaw the Almighty Dragonlord! Come forward, then! Kneel, and kiss our feet!"

4.name: The Price of Desolation
4.description: When Kinich is in Nightsoul's Blessing state, opponents hit by his Elemental Skill will enter the Desolation state, and when affected by Burning or Burgeon reaction DMG, they will restore 7 Nightsoul points to him. Nightsoul points can be gained this way once every 0.8s. The Desolation state will persist until this instance of Kinich's Nightsoul's Blessing state ends.

5.name: Flame Spirit Pact
5.description: After a nearby party member triggers a Nightsoul Burst, Kinich will gain 1 stack of Hunter's Experience that lasts 15s. Max 2 stacks. When Kinich uses <color=#FFD780FF>Canopy Hunter: Riding High</color>'s Scalespiker Cannon, all stacks of Hunter's Experience will be consumed, with each stack consumed increasing the DMG dealt by this Cannon shot by 320% of Kinich's ATK.

6.name: Night Realm's Gift: Repaid in Full
6.description:
When Kinich is in the air following <color=#FFD780FF>Canopy Hunter: Riding High</color>'s mid-air swing, he can consume 10 Phlogiston points to perform another mid-air swing.
While in an area with Phlogiston Mechanics within Natlan, he can use Nightsoul Transmission: Kinich. When the current active character is sprinting, in movement states that result from specific Talents, or in the air, when you switch to Kinich: Kinich will perform one of the following actions depending on the conditions met:
·When facing a Coilgrass Sigil that can be interacted with: He will fire a grappling hook towards it to move;
·When there are nearby opponents and you are in combat: Kinich will use Canopy Hunter: Riding High in the direction of the opponents;
Otherwise, Kinich will fire a grappling hook and swing, prioritizing valid Coilgrass Sigils as grapple targets.
Nightsoul Transmission can be triggered once every 10s by your own party.

When interacting with Coilgrass Sigils and other items that Yumkasaurs can interact with, "Canopy Hunter: Riding High" will be converted to "Yumkasaur Mimesis," which causes interactions with such items to follow rules applicable to Yumkasaurs, and which will not put Canopy Hunter: Riding High on CD.

8.name: Swift Envoy
8.description: While in an area with Phlogiston Mechanics within Natlan, interacting with some harvestable items will increase your own party members' Movement SPD by 15% for 10s. Additionally, the location of nearby <color=#FFD780FF>resources unique to Natlan</color> will appear on your mini-map.

0.name: Parrot's Beak
0.description: After Kinich lands from <color=#FFD780FF>Canopy Hunter: Riding High</color>'s mid-air swing, his Movement SPD will increase by 30% for 6s.\nAdditionally, Scalespiker Cannon's CRIT DMG is increased by 100%.

1.name: Tiger Beetle's Palm
1.description: When Kinich's Elemental Skill hits an opponent, it will decrease their <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro RES</color> by 30% for 6s.\nAdditionally, the first Scalespiker Cannon Kinich fires after entering Nightsoul's Blessing has increased AoE, and its DMG increases by 100%.

2.name: Protosuchian's Claw
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Canopy Hunter: Riding High</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Hummingbird's Feather
3.description: When in Nightsoul's Blessing, Kinich will restore 5 Energy after using his Loop Shots or after unleashing the Scalespiker Cannon. Energy can be regenerated this way once every 2.8s.\nAdditionally, <color=#FFD780FF>Hail to the Almighty Dragonlord</color> deals 70% more DMG.

4.name: Howler Monkey's Tail
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Hail to the Almighty Dragonlord</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Auspicious Beast's Shape
5.description: After Scalespiker Cannon hits an opponent, it will bounce between opponents once, dealing 700% of Kinich's ATK as <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro DMG</color>.\nIf this Scalespiker Cannon triggers the buffs that Ascension Talent "Flame Spirit Pact" or the Constellation "Tiger Beetle's Palm" grant to the Cannon, the bouncing attack will also obtain the relevant buffs.

fetter.title: Cat Upon the Eaves
fetter.detail: A courier for Komaniya Express, a delivery company in Inazuma. A nekomata who loves her job and human society.

costume.name: Whirling Bloom
costume.description: Kirara's outfit. The famous designer Chiori followed the principle of "comfortably wearing a beautiful flower upon one's body" when creating this outfit for Kirara.

costume.name: Phantom in Boots
costume.description: Kirara's outfit. The swashbuckling feline of fairytale fame, the crafty courier of dearly-held dreams... is pleased to make your acquaintance!

nameCard.name: Kirara: Neko Box
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\n"To Kirara, the smiles on her customers' faces are the best rewards possible."

0.name: Boxcutter
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 3 rapid claw strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Meow-teor Kick
1.description: #{LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Leaps into the air with all the agility of a cat passing through the bushes, and thwacks her foes with a flying kick that deals AoE Dendro DMG while creating a Shield of Safe Transport. This will also briefly apply Dendro to Kirara. The shield will absorb Dendro DMG with 250% effectiveness. The shield's DMG absorption will be based on Kirara's Max HP and will not exceed a certain percentage of that Max HP. The remaining DMG absorption on a Shield of Safe Transport will stack on a new one when it is created, and its duration will reset. Hold Out of her desire to "deliver within half a day," Kirara deploys a Shield of Safe Transport identical to the one that can be created by {LAYOUT_MOBILE#tapping}{LAYOUT_PC#pressing}{LAYOUT_PS#pressing} the skill. She will also curl up into a special express delivery box, entering the Urgent Neko Parcel state in order to move and fight more swiftly. Urgent Neko Parcel · Deals Dendro DMG to opponents she crashes into. This effect can be triggered once on each opponent every 0.5s. · When in this state, Kirara's movement speed, climbing speed, and jumping power are all increased, and her Stamina Consumption from climbing is increased. · When the duration ends or the skill is used again, a Flipclaw Strike more powerful than the attack in the {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Mode will be unleashed, dealing AoE Dendro DMG. · The Urgent Neko Parcel state lasts a maximum of 10s. When the state ends, the skill will enter CD. The longer Kirara spends in this state, the longer the CD will be. · Sprinting or actively canceling climbing will end this state early. "So you wanna know the secret to speedy deliveries? Well, it's all in the legs!"

description: Max Shield DMG Absorption|{param4:F1P} Max HP+{param5:I}
Max Shield DMG Absorption|{param4:F1P} Max HP+{param5:I}
Max Shield DMG Absorption|{param4:F1P} Max HP+{param5:I}
Max Shield DMG Absorption|{param4:F1P} Max HP+{param5:I}
Max Shield DMG Absorption|{param4:F1P} Max HP+{param5:I}
Max Shield DMG Absorption|{param4:F1P} Max HP+{param5:I}
Max Shield DMG Absorption|{param4:F1P} Max HP+{param5:I}
Max Shield DMG Absorption|{param4:F1P} Max HP+{param5:I}
Max Shield DMG Absorption|{param4:F1P} Max HP+{param5:I}
Max Shield DMG Absorption|{param4:F1P} Max HP+{param5:I}
Max Shield DMG Absorption|{param4:F1P} Max HP+{param5:I}
Max Shield DMG Absorption|{param4:F1P} Max HP+{param5:I}
Max Shield DMG Absorption|{param4:F1P} Max HP+{param5:I}
Max Shield DMG Absorption|{param4:F1P} Max HP+{param5:I}
Max Shield DMG Absorption|{param4:F1P} Max HP+{param5:I}

3.name: Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch
3.description: Smash opponents with a Special Delivery Package used for punishing parcel thieves, dealing AoE Dendro DMG. After the Special Delivery Package explodes, it will split up into many Cat Grass Cardamoms that will explode either upon contact with opponents or after a period of time, dealing AoE Dendro DMG.\n\n"Hehe, that's right, this stuff was made to deal with those parcel thieves! Remember to leave a 5-star rating once you've received yours!"

4.name: Bewitching, Betwitching Tails
4.description: When Kirara is in the Urgent Neko Parcel state of <color=#FFD780FF>Meow-teor Kick</color>, each impact against an opponent will grant her a stack of <color=#FFD780FF>Reinforced Packaging</color>. This effect can be triggered once for each opponent hit every 0.5s. Max 3 stacks. When the Urgent Neko Parcel state ends, each stack of Reinforced Packaging will create 1 Shield of Safe Transport for Kirara. The shields that are created this way will have 20% of the DMG absorption that the Shield of Safe Transport produced by <color=#FFD780FF>Meow-teor Kick</color> would have. If Kirara is already protected by a Shield of Safe Transport created by Meow-teor Kick, its DMG absorption will stack with these shields and its duration will reset.

5.name: Pupillary Variance
5.description: Every 1,000 Max HP Kirara possesses will increase the DMG dealt by <color=#FFD780FF>Meow-teor Kick</color> by 0.4%, and the DMG dealt by <color=#FFD780FF>Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch</color> by 0.3%.

6.name: Cat's Creeping Carriage
6.description: When Kirara is in the party, animals who produce Fowl, Raw Meat, or Chilled Meat will not be startled when party members approach them.

0.name: Material Circulation
0.description: Every 8,000 Max HP Kirara possesses will cause her to create 1 extra <color=#FFD780FF>Cat Grass Cardamom</color> when she uses <color=#FFD780FF>Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch</color>. A maximum of 4 extra can be created this way.

1.name: Perfectly Packaged
1.description: When Kirara is in the Urgent Neko Parcel state of <color=#FFD780FF>Meow-teor Kick</color>, she will grant other party members she crashes into Critical Transport Shields.\nThe DMG absorption of Critical Transport Shield is 40% of the maximum absorption <color=#FFD780FF>Meow-teor Kick</color>'s normal Shields of Safe Transport are capable of, and will absorb <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro DMG</color> with 250% effectiveness.\nCritical Transport Shields last 12s and can be triggered once on each character every 10s.

2.name: Universal Recognition
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Meow-teor Kick</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Steed of Skanda
3.description: After active character(s) protected by <color=#FFD780FF>Shields of Safe Transport</color> or <color=#FFD780FF>Critical Transport Shields</color> hit opponents with Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks, Kirara will perform a coordinated attack with them using <color=#FFD780FF>Small Cat Grass Cardamoms</color>, dealing 200% of her ATK as <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro DMG</color>. DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 3.8s. This CD is shared between all party members.

4.name: A Thousand Miles in a Day
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Countless Sights to See
5.description: All nearby party members gain a 12% All Elemental DMG Bonus for 15s after Kirara uses her Elemental Skill or Burst.

fetter.title: Fleeing Sunlight
fetter.detail: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius's confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

costume.name: Shooting Spark
costume.description: Klee's outfit. A set of clothing for an energetic child that even comes with a matching leather backpack.

costume.name: Blossoming Starlight
costume.description: An exquisite outfit Klee wears only for the most important performances. The colors are brilliant, like a cake adorned with cream flowers and crowned with scarlet candles. With it comes happiness and smiles that will fill your adventures.

nameCard.name: Klee: Explosive
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nKlee's lucky explosive — can you tell if it's Jumpy Dumpty or Dodoco? (Hint: Look carefully at the tail...)

0.name: Kaboom!
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Performs up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color> to opponents after a short casting time.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathering the power of Pyro, Klee plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

1.name: Jumpy Dumpty
1.description: Jumpy Dumpty is tons of boom-bang-fun! When thrown, Jumpy Dumpty bounces thrice, igniting and dealing AoE Pyro DMG with every bounce. On the third bounce, the bomb splits into many mines. The mines will explode upon contact with opponents, or after a short period of time, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. Starts with 2 charges. Jumpy Dumpty is Klee's good friend! She can't help but introduce him to everyone.

3.name: Sparks 'n' Splash
3.description: Klee's Blazing Delight! For the duration of this ability, continuously summons Sparks 'n' Splash to attack nearby opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.\n\nThe knights all believe that Klee must have a lucky star watching over her to have never been hurt by any of her own bombs...

4.name: Pounding Surprise
4.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Jumpy Dumpty</color> and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark.\nThis Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.
4.descriptionBuff:
When Klee's Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Jumpy Dumpty</color> and Normal Attacks deal DMG, there is a 50% chance to grant her an Explosive Spark. Using her Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Jumpy Dumpty</color> or Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> also grants 1 Explosive Spark. Klee can hold up to 3 Explosive Sparks.
While holding an Explosive Spark, Klee's Charged Attack will consume 1 Spark to perform a special stamina-free Charged Attack, Boom-Boom Strike, dealing 50% increased DMG.

<color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei: Secret Rite</color>
During the duration of Klee's Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>, her Normal Attack sequence does not reset. If Klee holds an Explosive Spark while performing Normal Attacks, the third attack in the sequence will consume 1 Spark to unleash an additional attack equivalent to Boom-Boom Strike.

5.name: Sparkling Burst
5.description: When Klee's Charged Attack results in a CRIT Hit, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.

6.name: All Of My Treasures!
6.description: Displays the location of nearby <color=#FFD780FF>resources unique to Mondstadt</color> on the mini-map.

9.name: Witch's Eve Rite: Sparkborne Magic
9.description:
After completing <color=#FFD780FF>Witch's Homework: Of Leaves That Spark</color>, Klee will become a <color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei</color> character. When the party includes at least 2 Hexerei characters, you will gain the <color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei: Secret Rite</color> effect, which enhances Hexerei characters.

<color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei: Secret Rite</color>
When Klee deals DMG with Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, or Elemental Bursts, she gains 1 Boom Badge that lasts 20s. Each type of attack can grant at most 1 Boom Badge this way, and each badge has its own independent timer. While Klee has 1/2/3 Boom Badges, her special Charged Attack Boom-Boom Strike deals 115%/130%/150% of its original DMG.

0.name: Chained Reactions
0.description: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>'s DMG.
0.descriptionBuff: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>'s DMG.\nFor 12s after triggering the above effect, Klee's ATK is increased by 60%.

1.name: Explosive Frags
1.description: Being hit by <color=#FFD780FF>Jumpy Dumpty</color>'s mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.
1.descriptionBuff: When Klee's Elemental Skill hits an opponent, that opponent's DEF will be decreased by 23% for 10s.

2.name: Exquisite Compound
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Jumpy Dumpty</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Sparkly Explosion
3.description: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.
3.descriptionBuff: An explosion will be triggered if Klee leaves the field while <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> is active or when Sparks 'n' Splash ends, dealing 555% of ATK as <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color>. If Klee is on-field when the explosion occurs, its DMG will be increased by 100%.

4.name: Nova Burst
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Blazing Delight
5.description: While under the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.\nWhen <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> is used, all party members will gain a 10% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> for 25s.
5.descriptionBuff:
While under the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.
For 25s after <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> is used, all other party members will gain a 10% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color>, and Klee will gain a 50% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei: Secret Rite</color>
· When Klee uses an <color=#FFD780FF>Explosive Spark</color>, there is a 50% chance it will not be consumed. Additionally, while <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> is active, Klee's Normal Attacks have a 40% chance on the first and second hits to consume an Explosive Spark, dealing an additional attack equivalent to Boom-Boom Strike to her opponent(s).

fetter.title: Crowfeather Kaburaya
fetter.detail: A general of the Tenryou Commission. Bold, decisive, and skilled in battle.

costume.name: Solemn Purity
costume.description: Kujou Sara's outfit. Prim and proper, it is a garment worthy of an Archon's devout servant.

nameCard.name: Kujou Sara: Tengu
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nKujou Sara may have forsaken the arrogant life of the tengu race, but she has never neglected their brilliance with the sword or their supernatural might.

0.name: Tengu Bowmanship
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Performs a more precise <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, crackling lightning will accumulate on the arrowhead. An arrow fully charged with the storm's might will deal <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.
When in the Crowfeather Cover state, a fully-charged arrow will leave a Crowfeather behind after it hits.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Tengu Stormcall
1.description: Retreats rapidly with the speed of a tengu, summoning the protection of the Crowfeather. Gains Crowfeather Cover for 18s, and when Kujou Sara fires a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Crowfeather Cover will be consumed, and will leave a Crowfeather at the target location. Crowfeathers will trigger Tengu Juurai: Ambush after a short time, dealing Electro DMG and granting the active character within its AoE an ATK Bonus based on Kujou Sara's Base ATK. The ATK Bonuses from different Tengu Juurai will not stack, and their effects and duration will be determined by the last Tengu Juurai to take effect. The tengu race have never lacked for exceptional talents who have received an Electro Vision. It's just that they often habitually chant praises to the Electro Archon while manipulating Electro. The chants go something like this "Show forth your might, O praiseworthy Narukami, and grant this supplicant your thunderous might! Sowaka!"

3.name: Subjugation: Koukou Sendou
3.description: Casts down Tengu Juurai: Titanbreaker, dealing AoE Electro DMG. Afterwards, Tengu Juurai: Titanbreaker spreads out into 4 consecutive bouts of Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster, dealing AoE Electro DMG. Tengu Juurai: Titanbreaker and Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster can provide the active character within their AoE with the same ATK Bonus as given by the Elemental Skill, Tengu Stormcall. The ATK Bonus provided by various kinds of Tengu Juurai will not stack, and their effects and duration will be determined by the last Tengu Juurai to take effect. Sara departed from her people, the tengu, and also temporarily lost her faith in the Tenryou Commission. But once the clouds over her heart cleared, she found her own lightning anew.

4.name: Immovable Will
4.description: While in the Crowfeather Cover state provided by <color=#FFD780FF>Tengu Stormcall</color>, Aimed Shot charge times are decreased by 60%.

5.name: Decorum
5.description: When Tengu Juurai: Ambush hits opponents, Kujou Sara will restore 1.2 Energy to all party members for every 100% Energy Recharge she has. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

6.name: Land Survey
6.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Inazuma, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

0.name: Crow's Eye
0.description: When Tengu Juurai grants characters ATK Bonuses or hits opponents, the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Tengu Stormcall</color> is decreased by 1s.\nThis effect can be triggered once every 3s.

1.name: Dark Wings
1.description: Unleashing <color=#FFD780FF>Tengu Stormcall</color> will leave a weaker Crowfeather at Kujou Sara's original position that will deal 30% of its original DMG.

2.name: The War Within
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Subjugation: Koukou Sendou</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Conclusive Proof
3.description: The number of Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster released by <color=#FFD780FF>Subjugation: Koukou Sendou</color> is increased to 6.

4.name: Spellsinger
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Tengu Stormcall</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Sin of Pride
5.description: The <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> of characters who have had their ATK increased by Tengu Juurai has its CRIT DMG increased by 60%.

fetter.title: Mender of Tribulations
fetter.detail: The capable and reliable Arataki Gang deputy leader - Please note: capable and reliable are not appellations for the "Arataki Gang," but for their deputy leader in specific.

costume.name: Arataki's Demonic Deputy
costume.description: Kuki Shinobu's outfit. The iconic oni mask she wears symbolizes her role as the Arataki Gang's terrifying "demonic deputy."

nameCard.name: Kuki Shinobu: Net
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\n"You know those Naku Weed rings they have in Inazuma? You know, the kind that can drive out evil? Shinobu got the idea that since wicked things won't cross their boundaries willingly, we could make them into items that could be actively used. Ah, her talent for being a shrine maiden truly is frightening..."

0.name: Shinobu's Shadowsword
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Sanctifying Ring
1.description: Creates a Grass Ring of Sanctification at the cost of part of her HP, dealing Electro DMG to nearby opponents. Grass Ring of Sanctification Follows your current active character around. Deals Electro DMG to nearby opponents every 1.5s and restores HP for active character(s) within the ring's AoE based on Kuki Shinobu's Max HP. The HP consumption from using this skill can only bring her to 20% HP. "Band the Naku Weed into a loop around your waist, and it shall exorcise evil."

description: Grass Ring of Sanctification Healing|{param2:F1P} Max HP+{param3:I}
Grass Ring of Sanctification Healing|{param2:F1P} Max HP+{param3:I}
Grass Ring of Sanctification Healing|{param2:F1P} Max HP+{param3:I}
Grass Ring of Sanctification Healing|{param2:F1P} Max HP+{param3:I}
Grass Ring of Sanctification Healing|{param2:F1P} Max HP+{param3:I}

Grass Ring of Sanctification Healing|{param2:F1P} Max HP+{param3:I}
Grass Ring of Sanctification Healing|{param2:F1P} Max HP+{param3:I}
Grass Ring of Sanctification Healing|{param2:F1P} Max HP+{param3:I}
Grass Ring of Sanctification Healing|{param2:F1P} Max HP+{param3:I}
Grass Ring of Sanctification Healing|{param2:F1P} Max HP+{param3:I}
