Fiery Passion Charged Attack Stamina Cost|{param13:F1}
Fiery Passion Charged Attack Stamina Cost|{param13:F1}

1.name: Riding the Night-Rainbow
1.description: With footwork swift as lightning and fierce as thunder, Varesa displays the true spirit of lucha libre, rushing forward a certain distance and dealing Nightsoul-aligned Electro DMG to opponents in her path. After using this Skill, Varesa gains 20 Nightsoul points and gains the "Follow-Up Strike" effect: Varesa has increased interruption resistance during this time, and upon pressing her Normal Attack, she will quickly unleash a Charged Attack that does not consume Stamina. "Follow-Up Strike" will be canceled after Varesa uses a Charged Attack. She will use different techniques based on whether the skill is Tapped or Held. Tap Quickly rush a certain distance forward. Hold Varesa enters the Nightsoul's Blessing state and switches to Sudden Onrush mode. Sudden Onrush Continuously consumes Nightsoul points. In this state, Varesa's Movement SPD and interruption resistance are increased. She can use terrain to execute flying leaps or consume additional Nightsoul points to traverse atop water or liquid Phlogiston while remaining immune to DMG from the latter. Nightsoul's Blessing: Varesa When she runs out of Nightsoul points, her Nightsoul's Blessing state will be canceled. When Varesa is in the Sudden Onrush state or Fiery Passion state, she will always be counted as being in the Nightsoul's Blessing state. Has 2 charges. When Varesa enters the Fiery Passion state, she will obtain an additional Tap charge of her Elemental Skill and its DMG will be increased. Fiery Passion · While not in the Fiery Passion state, Varesa can use Plunging Attacks to gain Nightsoul points. She will enter Fiery Passion when she reaches maximum Nightsoul points via this method, or when she uses her Elemental Burst Guardian Vent! · While in the Fiery Passion state, her Normal Attacks, Elemental Skill, and Elemental Burst will gain unique buffs. She can also use a special Elemental Burst shortly after using a Plunging Attack. · The Fiery Passion state lasts for up to 15s and will end when she runs out of Nightsoul points or after she leaves combat for a period of time. "Right now, I'm my own hero."

3.name: Guardian Vent!
3.description: Leaps into the air before using the momentum of the drop to unleash a powerful flying kick, dealing Nightsoul-aligned AoE Electro DMG to opponents — just like those heroes of justice in woven scrolls for kids! After using this Skill, Varesa's Nightsoul points will be restored to maximum and she will enter the Fiery Passion state. In the Fiery Passion state, Varesa's Elemental Burst will deal a greater amount of Nightsoul-aligned AoE Electro DMG. Additionally, she will briefly activate Apex Drive after using a Plunging Attack while in her Fiery Passion state. Apex Drive Increases Varesa's interruption resistance. While affected by Apex Drive, Varesa can ignore her Elemental Burst CD and consume less Energy to use her special Elemental Burst, "Guardian Vent: Volcano Kablam": This causes her to use the especially powerful Plunging Attack, the "Thunderous Tornado Eruption," which deals Nightsoul-aligned AoE Electro DMG upon landing before causing her to exit Apex Drive. This DMG is considered Plunging Attack DMG. Varesa will exit Apex Drive after using her Elemental Skill. In truth, the original name Varesa gave this move was the "Invincible Dynamic Heroic Justice Super Mega Ultimate Thundercrash Sky-Splitting Supersonic Boom Kick." Alas, this name proved too long, and she was too embarrassed to shout it in front of everyone, even with her mask on. As such, she changed it to its present title instead.

4.name: Tag-Team Triple Jump!
4.description:
After using the Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Riding the Night-Rainbow</color>, Varesa gains "Rainbow Crash" for 5s.
During this time, when Varesa uses a Plunging Attack, the shockwave DMG dealt when she hits the ground is increased by 50% of her ATK. If Varesa is in the Fiery Passion state, this ground impact DMG is increased by 180% of her ATK instead.

The Rainbow Crash effect will be canceled once a ground impact hits an opponent, or when its duration expires.

5.name: The Hero Twice-Returned!
5.description: When a nearby party member triggers a Nightsoul Burst, Varesa's ATK increases by 35% for 12s. Max 2 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently.

6.name: Night Realm's Gift: A Torch That Incinerates Evil
6.description: After Nightsoul points have been fully depleted, Varesa will switch to using Phlogiston to maintain the Sudden Onrush mode from her Nightsoul's Blessing.\nWhile in an area with Phlogiston Mechanics within Natlan, Nightsoul Transmission: Varesa can be used. When the current active character is sprinting or in movement modes caused by certain Talents, or at a certain height in the air, switching to Varesa will trigger the following: Varesa enters the Nightsoul's Blessing state, switches to Sudden Onrush mode, and obtains 20 Nightsoul points. Nightsoul Transmission can be triggered once every 10s by your own party.\nWhile in an area with Phlogiston Mechanics within Natlan, Varesa will not take fall DMG when using terrain differences to make leaps.

8.name: Blazing Heart, Singular Advance!
8.description: Varesa's Sprint speed is increased. When she is not in combat, her Sprint Stamina consumption will also increase.\nAdditionally, while in an area with Phlogiston Mechanics within Natlan, your party members will restore 20 Phlogiston when consuming food. This effect can occur once every 10s and does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or the Spiral Abyss.

0.name: Undying Passion
0.description:
The effects of the Ascension Talent "Tag-Team Triple Jump!" are enhanced:
When performing the Special Plunging Attack "Thunderous Tornado Eruption," Varesa will also gain "Rainbow Crash" for 5s.
When "Rainbow Crash" is in effect, Varesa's Plunging Attack ground impact DMG is increased by 180% of her ATK, whether she is in the Fiery Passion state or not. You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Tag-Team Triple Jump!" to access the above effect.

Additionally, when Varesa is in the Sudden Onrush mode of her Nightsoul's Blessing, she consumes 30% less Nightsoul points or Phlogiston.

1.name: Beyond the Edge of Light
1.description: Varesa will enter Apex Drive after using a Plunging Attack, regardless of whether she is in the Fiery Passion state or not.\nWhen Apex Drive is active, Varesa's interruption resistance will also further increase.\nAdditionally, Varesa will restore 11.5 Energy when her Plunging Attack ground impact hits an opponent.

2.name: Unbowed Resolve
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guardian Vent!</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: The Courage to Press On
3.description: Varesa will receive various buffs based on her state when using her Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Guardian Vent!</color> If Varesa:\n· Has neither Fiery Passion nor Apex Drive active, she will gain Diligent Refinement for 15s, which will increase her Plunging Attack ground impact DMG by 500% of her ATK, with a maximum increase of 20,000 DMG. This effect will be canceled once the ground impact hits an opponent, or if its duration ends.\n· If she has either Fiery Passion or Apex Drive active, this instance of her Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Guardian Vent!</color> deals 100% increased DMG.

4.name: Thoughts Floating on the Warm Breeze
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack: By the Horns</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: A Hero of Justice's Triumph
5.description: Varesa restores 30 Energy when she enters Apex Drive.\nHer Plunging Attacks and Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Guardian Vent!</color> gain 10% CRIT Rate and 100% CRIT DMG.\nAdditionally, when Varesa uses the Hold version of her Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Riding the Night-Rainbow</color>, or Taps her Elemental Skill while in the Sudden Onrush mode, she will restore Nightsoul points up to her maximum.

fetter.title: Knight of Boreas
fetter.detail: Grand Master of the Knights of Favonius. Knight of Boreas, protector of Mondstadt.

costume.name: Oath to the North Wind
costume.description: Varka's outfit. A knight's conviction is more steadfast than any armor, and Boreas's resolve is sharper than the keenest blade. To don this suit of iron and speak this oath — it seems but yesterday, yet the years have flown by.

nameCard.name: Varka: Lead Wolf
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nThe pack of wolves chased the northern wind, but only the leader knew that the wind had already begun swirling at their paws the moment they started running.

0.name: Favonius Bladework: Dancing Radiance
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Imitating an ancient knightly war-dance, Varka wields dual claymores to perform up to 5 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to charge forward and perform an especially powerful dual blade slash toward the front.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Windbound Execution
1.description:
Manifest the true essence of Favonius Bladework with absolute power. Produces different effects depending on whether the skill is Tapped or Held.

<color=#FFD780FF>Tap</color>
Leap forward and slash in one fluid motion, dealing <color=#80FFD7FF>AoE Anemo DMG</color> and switching to {LINK#N11280001}<color=#FFD780FF>Sturm und Drang</color>{/LINK} mode.
While in <color=#FFD780FF>Sturm und Drang</color>, Varka's Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG is increased, and he cannot perform Plunging Attacks. Also, when performing Normal or Charged Attacks, Varka's dual-wielded claymores will deal corresponding Elemental DMG based on the Elemental Types of the characters in the party, respectively. This Elemental DMG cannot be overridden by infusions.
Additionally, when in <color=#FFD780FF>Sturm und Drang</color>, if there are <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>, <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>, <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> or <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> characters in the party, Varka's Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Windbound Execution</color> will be converted to the special Elemental Skill, {LINK#N11280002}<color=#FFD780FF>Four Winds' Ascension</color>{/LINK}, dealing corresponding Elemental DMG and <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>. Additionally, Varka can also expend uses of the special Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Four Winds' Ascension</color> to perform a special Charged Attack, <color=#FFD780FF>Azure Devour</color>, that does not consume stamina to deal corresponding Elemental DMG and <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Hold</color>
After charging for a while, leap forward. The duration of the charge will increase the distance of the leap.

description: Sturm und Drang Charged Attack DMG|{param12:F1P}+{param13:F1P}
Sturm und Drang Charged Attack DMG|{param12:F1P}+{param13:F1P}
Sturm und Drang Charged Attack DMG|{param12:F1P}+{param13:F1P}

3.name: Northwind Avatar
3.description: In the name of the mightiest Knight of Boreas, unleash a powerful double slash attack toward the front, dealing 2 instances of <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>.\nIf there are <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>, <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>, <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> or <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> characters in the party, the first slash will be converted to deal corresponding Elemental DMG according to the aforementioned priority order of Elemental Types.

4.name: Dawn Wind's March
4.description: When there are <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>, <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>, <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> or <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> characters in the party, according to the aforementioned priority order of Elemental Types, every 1,000 points of Varka's ATK will grant Varka a 10% <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG Bonus</color> and corresponding Elemental DMG Bonus (among the aforementioned Elemental Types, only one element can gain bonus DMG this way). Up to 25% bonus DMG can be gained this way. \n\nAdditionally, if there are at least 2 <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo</color> characters, or at least 2 characters of the same Element among <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>, <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>, <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> or <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> in the party, the Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Special Charged Attack <color=#FFD780FF>Azure Devour</color> and the special Elemental Skill {LINK#N11280002}<color=#FFD780FF>Four Winds' Ascension</color>{/LINK} that Varka deals or unleashes while in the {LINK#N11280001}<color=#FFD780FF>Sturm und Drang</color>{/LINK} mode will deal 140% of their original DMG. If there are at least 2 <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo</color> characters and at least 2 other characters of the same element among <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>, <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>, <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> or <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> present in the party at the same time, the aforementioned effect will be increased to 220%.

5.name: Wind's Vanguard
5.description: When nearby party members trigger Swirl reaction(s), Varka gains one stack of <color=#FFD780FF>Azure Fang's Oath</color>, increasing the DMG dealt by his Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, special Charged Attack <color=#FFD780FF>Azure Devour</color> and special Elemental Skill {LINK#N11280002}<color=#FFD780FF>Four Winds' Ascension</color>{/LINK} by 7.5% for 8s. Max 4 stacks. Each character can grant Varka with 1 stack of <color=#FFD780FF>Azure Fang's Oath</color> every second this way.

6.name: Homebound Wind's Paean
6.description: For every party member from Mondstadt, the Hold version of Varka's Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Windbound Execution</color>'s CD is decreased by 5%.\nThis effect does not trigger in Domains, Trounce Domains, or the Spiral Abyss.

9.name: Witch's Eve Rite: Dawn's Return
9.description:
After completing <color=#FFD780FF>Witch's Homework: The Untitled Question</color>, Varka will become a <color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei</color> character. When the party includes at least 2 Hexerei characters, you will gain the <color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei: Secret Rite</color> effect, which enhances Hexerei characters.

<color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei: Secret Rite</color>
Enhances the special Elemental Skill {LINK#N11280002}<color=#FFD780FF>Four Winds' Ascension</color>{/LINK}: When Varka hits an opponent with Normal Attack(s) in {LINK#N11280001}<color=#FFD780FF>Sturm und Drang</color>{/LINK}, the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Four Winds' Ascension</color> will be reduced by 1s.

0.name: "Come, Friend, Let Us Dance Beneath the Moon's Soft Glow"
0.description: When Varka switches to {LINK#N11280001}<color=#FFD780FF>Sturm und Drang</color>{/LINK}, he will obtain an additional use of the special Elemental Skill {LINK#N11280002}<color=#FFD780FF>Four Winds' Ascension</color>{/LINK}.\nAdditionally, after switching to <color=#FFD780FF>Sturm und Drang</color>, Varka will gain the <color=#FFD780FF>Lyrical Libation</color> effect: When unleashing the special Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Four Winds' Ascension</color>, or when performing the special Charged Attack <color=#FFD780FF>Azure Devour</color>, Varka will consume this effect to deal 200% of the original DMG dealt by <color=#FFD780FF>Four Winds' Ascension</color> or <color=#FFD780FF>Azure Devour</color>.

1.name: "When Dawn Breaks, Our Journey Shall Take Flight"
1.description: When unleashing the special Elemental Skill {LINK#N11280002}<color=#FFD780FF>Four Winds' Ascension</color>{/LINK}, or when performing the special Charged Attack <color=#FFD780FF>Azure Devour</color>, Varka will perform an additional strike, dealing <color=#80FFD7FF>AoE Anemo DMG</color> equal to 800% of Varka's ATK.

2.name: "O Friend, Quaff Not the Bitter Wine That Brings Tears of Woe"
2.description: Increases Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11282}Windbound Execution{/LINK}</color> Level by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: "For None May Take From Us Our Freedom of Song"
3.description: When Varka triggers a Swirl reaction, based on the Elemental Types involved in the reaction, all nearby party members gain a 20% <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG Bonus</color> and the corresponding Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s.

4.name: "Fill High the Cup With Fine Wine, for Tyrants Come and Go"
4.description: Increases Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11285}Northwind Avatar{/LINK}</color> Level by 3.\n Maximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: "Beloved Mondstadt, Steadfast You Shall Shine"
5.description:
{LINK#N11280001}<color=#FFD780FF>Sturm und Drang</color>{/LINK} is enhanced:
· For a short time after unleashing the special Elemental Skill {LINK#N11280002}<color=#FFD780FF>Four Winds' Ascension</color>{/LINK}, Tapping on Varka's Elemental Skill or Holding his Normal Attack will not expend any uses of Four Winds' Ascension, and will perform one additional instance of the special Charged Attack, <color=#FFD780FF>Azure Devour</color>.
· For a short time after performing the special Charged Attack <color=#FFD780FF>Azure Devour</color>, tap on Varka's Elemental Skill to unleash an additional instance of <color=#FFD780FF>Four Winds' Ascension</color> without expending any uses of Four Winds' Ascension.
When triggering an additional special Charged Attack, Azure Devour, or unleashing an additional special Elemental Skill, Four Winds' Ascension, in this manner, the above effect cannot be triggered.

Additionally, the <color=#FFD780FF>Azure Fang's Oath</color> effect in Ascension Talent <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#P1282201}Wind's Vanguard{/LINK}</color> is enhanced: Every stack of <color=#FFD780FF>Azure Fang's Oath</color> will increase Varka's CRIT DMG by 20%.

N11280001.name: Sturm und Drang
N11280001.description:
Tap to unleash Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Windbound Execution</color> for Varka to switch to this mode.
While in this mode, Varka's Normal Attacks and Charged Attacks deal increased DMG, and he cannot perform Plunging Attacks. When Varka executes Normal or Charged Attacks, his dual-wielded claymores will deal corresponding Elemental DMG based on the Elemental Types of the characters in the party respectively:
· DMG dealt by the claymore wielded in his left hand will be converted to <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color> that cannot be overridden by other infusions.
· When there are <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>, <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>, <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> or <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> characters in the party, the claymore wielded in his right hand deals corresponding Elemental DMG that cannot be overridden by infusions, following the aforementioned priority order of Elemental Types.

Additionally, while in this mode, if there are <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>, <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>, <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> or <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> characters in the party, Varka's Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Windbound Execution</color> will be converted to the special Elemental Skill, <color=#FFD780FF>Four Winds' Ascension</color>.

N11280002.name: Four Winds' Ascension
N11280002.description:
Varka's special Elemental Skill. Deals AoE Elemental DMG that cannot be overridden by infusions corresponding to the element of the claymore wielded in Varka's right hand, and <color=#80FFD7FF>AoE Anemo DMG</color> to opponents.
Starts on cooldown and has 2 maximum uses.
When Varka is in <color=#FFD780FF>Sturm und Drang</color> mode and his Normal Attack hits an opponent, the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Four Winds' Ascension</color> will be reduced by 0.5s. Every time Varka switches to the <color=#FFD780FF>Sturm und Drang</color> mode, this effect can be triggered up to 15 times.
Additionally, Varka can expend uses of <color=#FFD780FF>Four Winds' Ascension</color> to perform a special Charged Attack, <color=#FFD780FF>Azure Devour</color>, that consumes no Stamina, dealing 2 instances of Elemental DMG corresponding to the element of the claymore wielded in his right hand, which cannot be overridden by infusions, and 2 instances of <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>.

fetter.title: Windborne Bard
fetter.detail: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

costume.name: Breezy Ode
costume.description: Venti's outfit. The clothes of a carefree bard.

nameCard.name: Venti: Azure Sky
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nThe bright blue of a cloudless sky and the melodious tone of Der Frühling complement each other perfectly.

0.name: Divine Marksmanship
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Performs a more precise <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
0.descriptionBuff:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Performs a more precise <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

<color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei: Secret Rite</color>
While the Stormeye created by the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> is active, Venti will gain additional buff effects:
· Venti's Normal Attacks will be converted into enemy-piercing <color=#FFD780FF>Windsunder Arrows</color> that deal even more <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color> to opponents along the path.
· When Venti's Normal Attacks hit opponents, Stormeye's duration is increased by 1s, and its CD is increased by 0.5s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s and up to 2 times after each use of the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color>.

1.name: Skyward Sonnet
1.description: #O wind upon which all hymns and songs fly, bear these earth-walkers up into the sky! {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} Summons a Wind Domain at the opponent's location, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching opponents into the air. Hold Summons an even larger Wind Domain with Venti as the epicenter, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching affected opponents into the air. After unleashing the Hold version of this ability, Venti rides the wind into the air. Opponents hit by Skyward Sonnet will fall to the ground slowly. In the days when gods and men walked the earth together, the heavens were filled with countless songs. This melody has long since been forgotten.

3.name: Wind's Grand Ode
3.description: Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge Stormeye that sucks in opponents and deals continuous Anemo DMG. Elemental Absorption If the Stormeye comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use. Many hymns written in praise of the Anemo Archon have been lost to time. This one sings of his mastery over the wind.

4.name: Embrace of Winds
4.description: Holding <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> creates an upcurrent that lasts for 20s.

5.name: Stormeye
5.description: Regenerates 15 Energy for Venti after the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> end.\nIf an Elemental Absorption occurred, this also restores 15 Energy to all characters of that corresponding element in the party.

6.name: Windrider
6.description: Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.\nNot stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

9.name: Witch's Eve Rite: Temporal Wind's Eulogy
9.description:
After completing <color=#FFD780FF>Witch's Homework: Of the Waking of Wind</color>, Venti will become a <color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei</color> character. When the party includes at least 2 Hexerei characters, you will gain the <color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei: Secret Rite</color> effect, which enhances Hexerei characters.

<color=#FFD780FF>Hexerei: Secret Rite</color>
While the Stormeye created by the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> is active, for 4s after a nearby active character triggers a Swirl reaction, that character's DMG is increased by 50%, and Venti's Stormeye deals 135% of its original DMG.

0.name: Splitting Gales
0.description: Fires 2 additional arrows per <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color>, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.
0.descriptionBuff: Fires 2 additional arrows per <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color>, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.\nAdditionally, 2 extra arrows that track opponents will be fired per <color=#FFD780FF>Windsunder Arrow</color>, each dealing 20% of the original arrow's DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 0.25s.

1.name: Breeze of Reminiscence
1.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> decreases opponents' <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.\nOpponents launched by <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> suffer an additional 12% <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES decrease while airborne.
1.descriptionBuff:
<color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> decreases opponents' <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES by 24% for 10s.
Additionally, after unleashing the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color>, Venti gains the <color=#FFD780FF>Wherever a Breeze Blows</color> effect, and the cooldown for his Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> is reset. After a <color=#FFD780FF>Windsunder Arrow</color> hits an opponent, there is also a 25% chance for Venti to gain the <color=#FFD780FF>Wherever a Breeze Blows</color> effect.

<color=#FFD780FF>Wherever a Breeze Blows</color>
When pressing to unleash the Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color>, 300% of the original amount of DMG is dealt. This effect lasts for 15s and is removed after Venti presses to use the Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color>.

2.name: Ode to Thousand Winds
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Hurricane of Freedom
3.description: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.
3.descriptionBuff: After unleashing his Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> or Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color>, Venti and his own active party members gain a 25% <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

4.name: Concerto dal Cielo
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Storm of Defiance
5.description: Targets who take DMG from <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> have their <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 20%.\nIf an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
5.descriptionBuff: Targets who take DMG from <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> have their <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 20%.\nIf an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.\nAdditionally, the DMG Venti deals to these opponents will gain a CRIT DMG Bonus of 100%.

fetter.title: Eons Adrift
fetter.detail: A wayfaring figure whose identity is a mystery. He dresses like a mountain ascetic, but he certainly does not act the part.

costume.name: A Wrathful Void
costume.description: #{REALNAME[ID(1)]}'s outfit. An ascetic's garb and hat can provide the wanderer some shelter from the rain, but they can do nothing to quell the winds and storms raging within.

nameCard.name: Wanderer: Drifter's Ballad
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nIn a world most transient does the past hide, and in the whims of flowing flowers does thin snow abide.

0.name: Yuuban Meigen
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 3 attacks using wind blades, dealing <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina, gathers a build up of high wind pressure, and deals <color=#80FFD7FF>AoE Anemo DMG</color> after a short casting time.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Calling upon the power of Anemo, the Wanderer plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in his path. Deals <color=#80FFD7FF>AoE Anemo DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

1.name: Hanega: Song of the Wind
1.description: Concentrates the power of the winds to break free from the shackles of the earth, dealing AoE Anemo DMG before leaping into the air and entering the Windfavored state. Windfavored The Wanderer cannot perform Plunging Attacks in this state. When he uses Normal and Charged Attacks, they will be converted into Kuugo: Fushoudan and Kuugo: Toufukai respectively; the DMG they deal and their AoE will be increased, and their DMG will be considered Normal and Charged Attack DMG respectively. Kuugo: Toufukai will not consume Stamina. The Wanderer will hover persistently during this time. While this state is active, the Wanderer's movements gain the following properties: ·Persistently consumes Kuugoryoku Points to maintain this hovering state. ·When sprinting, additional Kuugoryoku Points will be consumed for the Wanderer to accelerate mid-air. Holding sprint will cause persistent Kuugoryoku Point consumption to maintain speed. This effect will replace his default sprint. ·Jumping expends extra Kuugoryoku Points to increase hovering height. Holding jump will cause persistent Kuugoryoku Point consumption to keep increasing hovering height. Running out of Kuugoryoku Points will end the Windfavored state. A second cast during the duration of Windfavored will also end it. "The world dances in a weightless whirl, presenting a secret that can only be found in the flowers."

3.name: Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays
3.description: Compresses the atmosphere into a singular vacuum that grinds all troubles away, dealing multiple instances of AoE Anemo DMG. If the character is in the Windfavored state due to the skill "Hanega: Song of the Wind," Windfavored state will end after casting. "Bright be the narrowed gaze of the sky, casting its sight on dreams both past and present, like radiance washing over dust on the winds."

4.name: Jade-Claimed Flower
4.description:
If <color=#FFD780FF>Hanega: Song of the Wind</color> comes into contact with <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>/<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>/<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>/<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> when it is unleashed, this instance of the Windfavored state will obtain buffs according to the contacted element(s):
·<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>: Kuugoryoku Point cap increases by 20.
·<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>: ATK increases by 30%.
·<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>: CRIT Rate increases by 20%.
·<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>: When Normal and Charged Attacks hit an opponent, 0.8 Energy will be restored. Energy can be restored this way once every 0.2s.

You can have up to 2 different kinds of these buffs simultaneously.

5.name: Gales of Reverie
5.description: When the Wanderer hits opponents with Kuugo: Fushoudan or Kuugo: Toufukai in his <color=#FFD780FF>Windfavored</color> state, he has a 16% chance to obtain the Descent effect: The next time the Wanderer accelerates in mid-air while in this instance of the Windfavored state, this effect will be removed, this acceleration instance will not consume any Kuugoryoku Points, and he will fire off 4 wind arrows that deal 35% of his ATK as <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color> each.\nFor each Kuugo: Fushoudan and Kuugo: Toufukai that does not produce this effect, the next attack of those types will have a 12% increased chance of producing it. The calculation of the effect production is done once every 0.1s.

6.name: Strum the Swirling Winds
6.description: Mora expended when ascending Bows and Catalysts is decreased by 50%.

0.name: Shoban: Ostentatious Plumage
0.description: When in the <color=#FFD780FF>Windfavored</color> state, the Attack SPD of the Wanderer's Kuugo: Fushoudan and Kuugo: Toufukai is increased by 10%.\nAdditionally, the wind arrows fired by the Ascension Talent "Gales of Reverie" will deal an additional 25% of his ATK as DMG. You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Gales of Reverie."

1.name: Niban: Isle Amidst White Waves
1.description: When in the <color=#FFD780FF>Windfavored</color> state, <color=#FFD780FF>Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays</color> will see its DMG increased by 4% per point of difference between the max amount of Kuugoryoku Points contrasted with Kuugoryoku's present capacity when using this skill.\nThrough this method, you can increase Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays's DMG by a maximum of 200%.

2.name: Sanban: Moonflower Kusemai
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Yonban: Set Adrift into Spring
3.description: When casting <color=#FFD780FF>Hanega: Song of the Wind</color>, should the Ascension Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower" be triggered, the character will gain buffs in correspondence to the contacted Elemental Type(s), and also obtain a random untriggered buff. A maximum of 3 such corresponding elemental buffs can exist simultaneously.\nYou must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower."

4.name: Matsuban: Ancient Illuminator From Abroad
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Hanega: Song of the Wind</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Shugen: The Curtains' Melancholic Sway
5.description: When the Wanderer actively hits an opponent with Kuugo: Fushoudan while in the <color=#FFD780FF>Windfavored</color> state, the following effects will occur:\n·Deals an additional instance of Kuugo: Fushoudan at the position hit, dealing 40% of the attack's original DMG. This DMG will be considered Normal Attack DMG.\n·When the Wanderer falls below 40 Kuugoryoku Points, restores 4 Points to him. Kuugoryoku Points can be restored in this manner once every 0.2s. This restoration can occur up to 5 times within one Windfavored duration.

fetter.title: Emissary of Solitary Iniquity
fetter.detail: Duke of the Fortress of Meropide, Lord Incognito of the murky depths.

costume.name: Night's Chilling Howl
costume.description: Wriothesley's outfit. It radiates both dignity and strength, with the rugged gray wolf chain serving as the mark of his rulership over the Fortress of Meropide.

nameCard.name: Wriothesley: Detention
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nMaintaining order at the Fortress of Meropide is no simple affair. As such, a deft and sometimes firm hand is needed — along with a small pinch of truly regrettable cruelty.

0.name: Forceful Fists of Frost
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Coalescing frost about his fist, Wriothesley will unleash powerful <color=#FFD780FF>Repelling Fists</color>, performing up to 5 rapid attacks that deal <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>.
Apart from this, Normal Attack combo count will not reset for a short time after using Icefang Rush or sprinting.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a fixed amount of Stamina to leap and unleash a <color=#FFD780FF>Vaulting Fist</color>, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>AoE Cryo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>AoE Cryo DMG</color> upon impact.

1.name: Icefang Rush
1.description: Adjusting his breathing, rhythm, and pace, Wriothesley sprints forward a short distance, entering the Chilling Penalty state and unleashing more powerful attacks than before. Chilling Penalty ·Increases Wriothesley's interruption resistance ·When his HP is above 50%, it will enhance the Repelling Fists of Normal Attack: Forceful Fists of Frost and increase its DMG. When such an attack hits, it will consume a fixed amount of Wriothesley's HP. HP can be lost this way once every 0.1s. This effect will be canceled should Wriothesley leave the field. "Past convictions are past. It is our future choices that we must grasp." "Defy your fate, or else this glutton be, to pay your fate's due, by the crime and thee."

description: Enhanced Repelling Fist DMG|{param1:F1P} Normal Attack DMG
Enhanced Repelling Fist DMG|{param1:F1P} Normal Attack DMG
Enhanced Repelling Fist DMG|{param1:F1P} Normal Attack DMG
Enhanced Repelling Fist DMG|{param1:F1P} Normal Attack DMG
Enhanced Repelling Fist DMG|{param1:F1P} Normal Attack DMG
Enhanced Repelling Fist DMG|{param1:F1P} Normal Attack DMG
Enhanced Repelling Fist DMG|{param1:F1P} Normal Attack DMG
Enhanced Repelling Fist DMG|{param1:F1P} Normal Attack DMG
Enhanced Repelling Fist DMG|{param1:F1P} Normal Attack DMG
Enhanced Repelling Fist DMG|{param1:F1P} Normal Attack DMG
Enhanced Repelling Fist DMG|{param1:F1P} Normal Attack DMG
Enhanced Repelling Fist DMG|{param1:F1P} Normal Attack DMG
Enhanced Repelling Fist DMG|{param1:F1P} Normal Attack DMG
Enhanced Repelling Fist DMG|{param1:F1P} Normal Attack DMG
Enhanced Repelling Fist DMG|{param1:F1P} Normal Attack DMG

3.name: Darkgold Wolfbite
3.description: Activating his boxing gloves, Wriothesley strikes out with an icy straight, then uses Icicle Impact to cause multiple instances of AoE Cryo DMG in a frontal area. Arkhe: Ousia After Icicle Impact ends, a Surging Blade will descend upon the opponent's position, dealing Ousia-aligned Cryo DMG. There are some things that even the Duke of the Fortress of Meropide can do little about — for example, complicated paperwork, the trivialities of a supervisor, or even... little kids pasting a whole host of cute but difficult-to-remove stickers on his boxing gloves.

4.name: There Shall Be a Plea for Justice
4.description: When Wriothesley's HP is less than 60%, he will obtain a Gracious Rebuke. The next Charged Attack of his <color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack: Forceful Fists of Frost</color> will be enhanced to become Rebuke: Vaulting Fist. It will not consume Stamina, will deal 50% increased DMG, and after hitting will restore HP for Wriothesley equal to 30% of his Max HP.\nYou can gain a Gracious Rebuke this way once every 5s.

5.name: There Shall Be a Reckoning for Sin
5.description: When Wriothesley's current HP increases or decreases, if he is in the Chilling Penalty state conferred by <color=#FFD780FF>Icefang Rush</color>, Chilling Penalty will gain one stack of Prosecution Edict. Max 5 stacks. Each stack will increase Wriothesley's ATK by 6%.

6.name: The Duke's Grace
6.description: When Wriothesley crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

0.name: Terror for the Evildoers
0.description:
The Gracious Rebuke from the Ascension Talent "There Shall Be a Plea for Justice" is changed to this:
When Wriothesley's HP is less than 60% or while he is in the Chilling Penalty state caused by <color=#FFD780FF>Icefang Rush</color>, when the fifth attack of Repelling Fists hits, it will create a Gracious Rebuke. 1 Gracious Rebuke effect can be obtained every 2.5s.

Additionally, Rebuke: Vaulting Fist will obtain the following enhancement:
· The DMG Bonus gained will be further increased to 200%.
· When it hits while Wriothesley is in the Chilling Penalty state, that state's duration is extended by 4s. 1 such extension can occur per 1 Chilling Penalty duration.

You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "There Shall Be a Plea for Justice."

1.name: Shackles for the Arrogant
1.description: When using <color=#FFD780FF>Darkgold Wolfbite</color>, each Prosecution Edict stack from the Ascension Talent "There Shall Be a Reckoning for Sin" will increase said ability's DMG dealt by 40%.\nYou must first unlock the Ascension Talent "There Shall Be a Reckoning for Sin."

2.name: Punishment for the Frauds
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack: Forceful Fists of Frost</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Redemption for the Suffering
3.description: The HP restored to Wriothesley through Rebuke: Vaulting Fist will be increased to 50% of his Max HP. You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "There Shall Be a Plea for Justice."\nAdditionally, when Wriothesley is healed, if the amount of healing overflows, the following effects will occur depending on whether he is on the field or not. If he is on the field, his ATK SPD will be increased by 20% for 4s. If he is off-field, all of your own party members' ATK SPD will be increased by 10% for 6s. These two methods of increasing ATK SPD cannot stack.

4.name: Mercy for the Wronged
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Darkgold Wolfbite</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Esteem for the Innocent
5.description: The CRIT Rate of Rebuke: Vaulting Fist will be increased by 10%, and its CRIT DMG by 80%. When unleashed, it will also create an additional icicle that deals 100% of Rebuke: Vaulting Fist's Base DMG as <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>. DMG dealt this way is regarded as Charged Attack DMG.\nYou must first unlock the Ascension Talent "There Shall Be a Plea for Justice."

fetter.title: Exquisite Delicacy
fetter.detail: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

costume.name: Red Pepper and Turmeric
costume.description: Xiangling's outfit. Light and comfortable clothing brimming with fiery passion.

costume.name: New Year's Cheer
costume.description: Xiangling's outfit. The red coat glows like a stove amidst cold winds, topped with a hat that, at Hu Tao's suggestion, took inspiration from Guoba's appearance — a design that's right up Xiangling's alley.

nameCard.name: Xiangling: Fresh from the Pan
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nTry saying this three times fast: "Guoba sears sea snails by Liyue's sea shore."

0.name: Dough-Fu
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Guoba Attack
1.description: Summons Guoba, who will continuously breathe fire at opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.\n\nGuoba loves to eat spicy food. Problem is, his stomach can't handle something this spicy.

3.name: Pyronado
3.description: Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her. The Pyronado will move with your character for the ability's duration, dealing Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path. There will never be enough heat. Never.

4.name: Crossfire
4.description: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.

5.name: Beware, It's Super Hot!
5.description: When <color=#FFD780FF>Guoba Attack</color>'s effect ends, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.

6.name: Chef de Cuisine
6.description: When Xiangling cooks an ATK-boosting dish perfectly, she has a 12% chance to receive double the product.

0.name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
0.description: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro RES</color> reduced by 15% for 6s.

1.name: Oil Meets Fire
1.description: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

2.name: Deepfry
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Pyronado</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Slowbake
3.description: <color=#FFD780FF>Pyronado</color>'s duration is increased by 40%.

4.name: Guoba Mad
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guoba Attack</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Condensed Pyronado
5.description: For the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Pyronado</color>, all party members receive a 15% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color>.

fetter.title: Passerine Herald
fetter.detail: One of the Mighty and Illuminated Adepti of Jueyun, known as "Cloud Retainer." Expert in all kinds of mechanical contraptions, her heart now turns towards the affairs of the mortal world, through which she walks under the name "Xianyun."

costume.name: A Guest's August Omen
costume.description: Xianyun's outfit. These garments were not designed by any famous tailor, though at first glance, they appear to be made of the finest silks. Yet closer inspection reveals that the weave is not of silk, cotton, or linen, and a glow runs through it like an adeptus's feather coat. One can only imagine from what provenance she obtained such clothes...

nameCard.name: Xianyun: White Clouds
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nThose who the truth tell, commuted shall their sentence be. Be honest. When Cloud Retainer asked you, "Do you perceive one as merely some larger bird?", did you also append the thoughts, "Yes, and you talk, and fiddle with funny machines"?

0.name: Word of Wind and Flower
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Summons swirling winds to perform up to 4 attacks, dealing <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and launches a Breeze Bolt in a straight line that deals <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color> to opponents along its path.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathers the power of Anemo and plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#80FFD7FF>AoE Anemo DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

1.name: White Clouds at Dawn
1.description: Xianyun enters the Cloud Transmogrification state, in which she will not take Fall DMG, and uses Skyladder once. In this state, her Plunging Attack will be converted into Driftcloud Wave instead, which deals AoE Anemo DMG and ends the Cloud Transmogrification state. This DMG is considered Plunging Attack DMG. Each use of Skyladder while in this state increases the DMG and AoE of the next Driftcloud Wave used. Skyladder Can be used while in mid-air. Xianyun leaps forward, dealing Anemo DMG to targets along her path. During each Cloud Transmogrification state Xianyun enters, Skyladder may be used up to 3 times and only 1 instance of Skyladder DMG can be dealt to any one opponent. If Skyladder is not used again in a short period, the Cloud Transmogrification state will be canceled. If Xianyun does not use Driftcloud Wave while in this state, the next CD of White Clouds at Dawn will be decreased by 3s. Do not shake Cloud Retainer's hand too tightly; cranes are quite adept at gripping.

3.name: Stars Gather at Dusk
3.description: Brings forth a sacred breeze that deals AoE Anemo DMG and heals all nearby characters based on Xianyun's ATK. It will also summon the "Starwicker" mechanism. Starwicker ·Continuously follows the active character and periodically heals all nearby party members based on Xianyun's ATK. ·Starts with 8 stacks of Adeptal Assistance. While Adeptal Assistance is active, nearby active characters in the party will have their jump height increased. ·When the active character completes a Plunging Attack, Starwicker will consume 1 stack of Adeptal Assistance and deal AoE Anemo DMG. Only 1 Starwicker can exist simultaneously. This is the newest invention in the "Lunastar Artifices" series, of which previous creations include the Supreme Cuisine Machine, the Snowdrift Mechanism, the Supreme Housekeeping Machine, the Floating Toting Device, and the Bloom Pruner. This series was intended for young humans Cloud Retainer held in great esteem, and so was not designed with a certain half-adeptus in mind. However, when offered Starwicker, a certain female disciple of hers had these emotionless words to say: "No thank you." Cloud Retainer thus had no choice but to keep it herself.

4.name: Galefeather Pursuit
4.description: Each opponent hit by Driftcloud Waves from <color=#FFD780FF>White Clouds at Dawn</color> will grant all nearby party members 1 stack of Storm Pinion for 20s. Max 4 stacks. These will cause the characters' Plunging Attack CRIT Rate to increase by 4%/6%/8%/10% respectively.\nEach Storm Pinion created by hitting an opponent has an independent duration.

5.name: Consider, the Adeptus in Her Realm
5.description: When the Starwicker created by <color=#FFD780FF>Stars Gather at Dusk</color> has Adeptal Assistance stacks, nearby active characters' Plunging Attack shockwave DMG will be increased by 200% of Xianyun's ATK. The maximum DMG increase that can be achieved this way is 9,000.\nEach Plunging Attack shockwave DMG instance can only apply this increased DMG effect to a single opponent. Each character can trigger this effect once every 0.4s.

6.name: Crane Form
6.description: Increases gliding SPD for your own party members by 15%.\nNot stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

0.name: Purifying Wind
0.description: <color=#FFD780FF>White Clouds at Dawn</color> gains 1 additional charge.

1.name: Aloof From the World
1.description:
After using a Skyladder from <color=#FFD780FF>White Clouds at Dawn</color>, Xianyun's ATK will be increased by 20% for 15s.
Additionally, the effects of the Ascension Talent "Consider, the Adeptus in Her Realm" will be enhanced: When the Starwicker created by <color=#FFD780FF>Stars Gather at Dusk</color> has Adeptal Assistance stacks, nearby active characters' Plunging Attack shockwave DMG will be increased by 400% of Xianyun's ATK. The maximum DMG increase that can be achieved this way is 18,000.
Each Plunging Attack shockwave DMG instance can only apply this increased DMG effect to a single opponent. Each character can trigger this effect once every 0.4s.
You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Consider, the Adeptus in Her Realm."

2.name: Creations of Star and Moon
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Stars Gather at Dusk</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Mystery Millet Gourmet
3.description: After using Skyladder 1/2/3 times during one <color=#FFD780FF>White Clouds at Dawn</color> Cloud Transmogrification state, when a Driftcloud Wave unleashed during that instance hits an opponent, it will heal all nearby party members for 50%/80%/150% of Xianyun's ATK. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.

4.name: Astride Rose-Colored Clouds
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>White Clouds at Dawn</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: They Call Her Cloud Retainer
5.description: After Xianyun uses 1/2/3 Skyladders within one Cloud Transmogrification caused by <color=#FFD780FF>White Clouds at Dawn</color>, the CRIT DMG of a Driftcloud Wave created in this instance of Cloud Transmogrification will be increased by 15%/35%/70%.\nWithin 16s after Xianyun has used <color=#FFD780FF>Stars Gather at Dusk</color>, White Clouds at Dawn will not enter CD. This effect will be canceled once she has used White Clouds at Dawn 8 times.

fetter.title: Vigilant Yaksha
fetter.detail: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

costume.name: Endurer of Eons
costume.description: Xiao's outfit. Classical battle-wear fit for a thousand years of evil-conquering.

nameCard.name: Xiao: Mask
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nHe longs for a day to come when he will wear the mask and dance — not to conquer demons, but to the tune of that flute amid a sea of flowers.

0.name: Whirlwind Thrust
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward thrust.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
Xiao does not take DMG from performing Plunging Attacks.

1.name: Lemniscatic Wind Cycling
1.description: Xiao lunges forward, dealing Anemo DMG to opponents in his path. Can be used in mid-air. Starts with 2 charges. According to the legends of another land, the world will someday be crushed by two great wind wheels. Xiao's mastery over polearms is transcendent, ripping his foes apart like those legendary wind wheels.

3.name: Bane of All Evil
3.description: Xiao dons the Yaksha Mask that set gods and demons trembling millennia ago. Yaksha's Mask ·Greatly increases Xiao's jumping ability. ·Increases his attack AoE and attack DMG. ·Converts attack DMG into Anemo DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion. In this state, Xiao will continuously lose HP. The effects of this skill end when Xiao leaves the field. Donning the Mask of the Yaksha, Xiao takes the terrifying, demon-conquering form of the Vigilant Yaksha. But this great power has also brought him great suffering. Some call him "The Bane of All Evil."

description: Life Drain|{param2:F1P} Current HP Per Second
Life Drain|{param2:F1P} Current HP Per Second
Life Drain|{param2:F1P} Current HP Per Second
